With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of new clothes and cosmetics for her business. She decided to join Yehu because of the easy accessibility of loan facilities.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of new clothes and cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase one cow and two calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients such as wheat flour, sugar, and cooking fat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy vegetables, green maize, and fruits to add to her business

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 57 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. tortas y galletas, ella prepara tortas y bocaditos para diferentes eventos como matrimonios, cumpleaños entre otros compromisos, ella es propietaria D. un local que atienD. desD. las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. venta D. tortas y bocaditos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como mantequilla, azúcar, harina y utensilios.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Victoria belongs to the Hatun Rumiyoc communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Victoria is 57 years old, married, and has six children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling cakes and cookies.  She makes cakes and snacks for different events like weddings and birthdays, among other events.  She is the owner of a place that she attends to from 9:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m.

She wants to expand and improve her business of selling cakes and snacks.  She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like butter, sugar, flour, and utensils.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy butter, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Maria; La socia tiene 60 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 7 de ellos son independientes y la socia solo vive con uno de 18 años de edad; la socia se dedica la la venta de verduras, ella compra verduras ala por mayor y las vende en uno de los mercados en Cusco, la socia requiere el crédito para invertir en la compra de verduras para aumentar su negocio y poder mejorar sus ganancias. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de verduras.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the 'Imasumac II' community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Maria is 60 years old, married, and has eight children, seven of whom live independently.  She only lives with one of her children who is 18 years old.  Maria's business is selling vegetables.  She buys vegetables wholesale and sells them in one of the markets in Cusco.  She needs this loan to invest in buying vegetables in order to increase her business and improve her profits.  She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables.

Maria is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying vegetables

loans.name: Juan Cancio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNION FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; Las reuniones del banco son cada treinta días en el distrito de Wanchaq perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan, él nació en la ciudad de Chinchero, él tiene 58 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 2 hijos, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos para autos. Su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su misma casa, Sr. Juan trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja ya que a la vez también cuenta con un taller de mecánica siendo el socio quien se ocupa de este negocio, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su tienda de repuestos como accesorios de autos alfombras, siliconas, espejos, pistones, anillos, empaques, radiadores, embriagues, carburadores y otras cosas más.  

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Juan is a member of the “Unión Fuerza y Amistad” communal bank which meets every thirty days in Wanchaq District which belongs to Cusco Province and Department.


Juan was born in the city of Chinchero; he’s 58 years old and is in a common law relationship and has two children.  He alternates his daily chores with a business selling car spare parts.  His business is located in his home.  He works together with his spouse because he also has a car repair shop that he takes care of himself.  He is a very cheerful person who very much wants to get ahead for his family.  He’s been in this business four years now and does very well thanks to the efforts he puts into his work.


He requests the loan to buy more merchandise for his spare parts business like car mats, silicone lubricants, mirrors, pistons, rings, seals, radiators, brakes, carburetors and other things.  He is happy with the loan and commits to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is a hardworking businesswoman aged 39 years. She is married and blessed with three children, who are still in school. She has been managing a tailoring business to earn a living. She also does farming to increase her income. She has employed two people to assist her to run the business. In the next five years, Margaret wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings to buy fabric.

loans.use: To buy fabric

loans.name: C9294 Intwarane Group

texts.en:
Vincent is 26-year-old man with two children, 2 and 3 years old. For the past year, he has owned a small shop which sells charcoal. His business is open from 7 a.m until 5 p.m. every day. Since Vincent and his business are well known in the region, he is the leader of the group called "Intwarane" in the local language. His group consists of one woman and three men.

Vincent has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. With these profits, he and his team expect to save money for their future and to pay their children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Muache

texts.en:
Muache is a married woman with one school-going child. Her husband is employed and contributes in providing for the family's basic needs. Muache has a house with piped water but not electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

Muache has operated a vegetable grocery for the past three years; she also sells piped water. Her potential clients are her neighbors. Muache faces a major challenge of competition from other vegetable grocery operators. She dreams of buying a water tank for her water business.

Muache plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase vegetables such as carrots, tomatoes, potatoes and onions for her grocery. She decided to join Yehu because it enables small businesswomen to expand their businesses through loan lending.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables such as carrots, tomatoes, potatoes and onions.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Aurelia; ella tiene 62 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo D. periodismo, ella trabaja en forma independiente, la socia también es cesante D. educación, por medio D. estos trabajos la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere refaccionar y arreglar su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales D. construcción como cemento y ladrillos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Aurelia, 62, belongs to the “Hatunrumiyoc” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  She’s married and has two children.


She alternates her daily chores with journalism; she works independently.  She’s also a retired teacher.  Through these jobs she’s able to support her children.  She’d like to do some home improvements and is asking for a loan to buy building materials and supplies like cement and bricks.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement and bricks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase one milking cow and fodder

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Teresa; La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 23, 22, 18, 14, 8 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la atención de su panadería, la socia tiene una panadería en casa y en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de harina al por mayor para la elaboración de los panes y pasteles que elabora. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina al por mayor para la elaboración de panes y pasteles.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Teresa, 38, is a member of the “Imasumac II” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  She’s married and has five children who are 23, 22, 18, 14 and 8 years old.  She runs a bakery at home and needs to invest the loan on this occasion to buy flour at wholesale for the bread and cakes she makes.  She requests the loan to invest in the purchase of flour at wholesale to make bread and cakes.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make all her installment payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy flour at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loans.name: Mishi

texts.en:
Mishi is a married woman with nine school-going children. Her husband is employed and contributes to provide for the family's basic needs. Mishi has a house with electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children. 

Mishi has operated a business selling piped water for the past three years; her potential clients are her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. During the rainy season there is low demand for her water because people use rain water instead. Mishi dreams of owning another water tank for her business.

Mishi plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase new taps and pay for their installation. She decided to join Yehu because of its low loan interest rates.

loans.use: To purchase new taps and pay for their installation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase six sheep

loans.name: Manuel Angel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Manuel Angel; el tiene 66 años de edad y es casado y tiene 7 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatillas, el tiene una tienda donde vende y fabrica zapatillas y en algunas oportunidades también realiza trabajos de artesanía, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de zapatos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar cueros y materiales para fabricar los zapatos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Manuel Ángel, 66, belongs to the “Hatun Rumiyoc” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  He’s married and has 7 children.  He alternates his daily chores with a business selling sandals.  He has a store where he sells and manufactures sandals; he makes crafts sometimes too.  He works from 8am until 6pm and he’d like to expand and improve the shoe sales business so is asking for a loan to buy leather and supplies to make shoes.  He is happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy leather and supplies to make shoes

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en el distrito de Wanchaq (Provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco).

El socio Leoncio nació en la ciudad de Urcos de la provincia de Quispicanchis,  él tiene 44 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 3 hijos; el socio Leoncio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra de carros usados para luego desarmarlos y después vender sus partes como chatarra en una feria sabatina.  

El socio Leoncio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio de chatarrería.

El socio Leoncio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Leoncio, 44, belongs to the “Unión, Fuerza y Amistad” communal bank which meets monthly in Wanchaq (Cusco Province and Department).  He was born in the city of Urcos in Quispicanchis Province.  He’s in a common law relationship and has three children.  He alternates his daily chores with a business buying used cars to dismantle and sell the parts as junk metal in a Saturday market.  He’s asking for the loan to buy more merchandise for his recycled metal business.  Leoncio is happy with the loan and commits to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy more material for his junk metal business.

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es:
Angel Maria tiene 34 años de edad, es soltera y vive con tres hijos; todos menores de 18 años.

Angel Maria vende tamales de elote y atol hace 12 años. Ella vende sus productos en un mercado público de la ciudad. Este oficio lo aprendió de su mamá. Ella se traslada 8 kilometros en bus para ir a vender sus productos todos los días.

Angel Maria ha solicitado un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de un carro para vender panes rellenos (parecidos a los hot dogs). Ella ya vende los panes en el mercado, en la acera de la calle, pero no tiene todo lo necesario para tener su negocio bien organizado y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Con el préstamo Angel Maria comprará un carro para hacer y vender los panes rellenos, al igual que los ingredientes para hacerlos (pan, mortadela, salsa de tomate, mostaza, etc).

En un futuro Angel Maria planea ahorrar para poder construir una habitación en su casa de adobe (tierra o barro crudo). Ella quisiera tener una casa más grande donde haya más privacidad para cada uno de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Angel Maria is 34 years old and single.  She lives with her three children, all less than 18 years old.  Angel Maria has been selling corn tamales and “atol” [corn-based beverage] for 12 years.  She sells her products at a public city market.  She learned this job from her mother.  She travels eight kilometers by bus in order to go to sell her products every day.

Angel Maria is requesting a loan from the Fundación Campo in order to buy a cart to sell “panes rellenos” [similar to hot dogs].  She already sells the bread at the market on the sidewalk by the street.  However, she does not have everything she needs to have a well-organized business and to satisfy her customers’ demands.

Angel Maria will buy a cart to make and sell the panes rellenos.  She will also buy the ingredients to make them (bread, mortadella, tomato sauce, and mustard, etc.)

In the future Angel Maria plans to save to be able to build a room in her adobe (earth or unrefined clay)  house.  She would like to have a bigger house where there is more privacy for each one of her children.

loans.use: to buy a cart to make and sell hot dogs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee to sell

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a divorced woman with one school-going child. She has a house with electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her child. 

Amina has operated a cafe for the past four years; her potential clients are lorry drivers and her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of competition from other cafe operators. She dreams of establishing a hotel.

Amina plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase foodstuffs such as wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil and to renovate her cafe. She decided to join Yehu because of the easy accessibility of loan facilities and affordable repayment rates.

loans.use: To purchase foodstuffs and to renovate her cafe.

loans.name: Aristides

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Aristides; La socia tiene 52 años de edad, el socio es soltero y tiene 2 hijos de 18, 15 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la artesanía, el socio trabaja con sus hermana en el taller de ella haciendo el mantenimiento del horno, y elaborando los moldes; el socio también realiza trabajos independientemente y alquila el horno de sus hermana para terminar sus trabajos, el socio desea invertir el crédito en la compra de arcilla, esmaltes, el socio desea invertir el crédito en la compra de arcilla, esmaltes y el alquiler del horno para realizar trabajaos para venderlos en navidad.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: This gentleman is a member of the ”IMASUMAC II” Communal Bank. The communal bank is based in the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco. Señor Aristides is 52 years old, single, and has 2 children, aged 18 and 15 years old. He works with his sister in her pottery workshop, taking care of the kiln and making moulds. He would like to invest the loan in buying clay, glazes, and in renting the kiln so that he can make pieces to sell at Christmas time. Señor Aristides is grateful for the loan and promises to complete his repayments on schedule.

loans.use: To buy clay and glazes, and to rent a kiln, to make items to sell for Christmas.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en: Pauline used her previous loan of 70,000 KES to buy computers. These additional computers have enabled her to serve her customers more efficiently in printing and photocopying, hence attracting more customers. Pauline has requested another loan of 70,000 KES to buy stationery such as printing paper.

loans.use: To buy stationery such as printing paper

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy materials for making assorted candies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase sacks of charcoal and firewood for resale.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 37-year-old single parent with two children. He owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. Julius has been selling clothes for seven years; he started with 500,000 UGX and now has 4,000,000 UGX. His hardship is bad debtors. Julius' goals are to have a wholesale business and to build another residential house. Julius needs a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: C5666 Duteraninkunga Group

texts.en:
Consilde, 30 years old, is married and has two children, 2 and 9 years old. She is the president of a group called "Duteraninkunga" in the local language. The group is composed of five women. In the photo, Consilde is the first person on the left.

Consilde has been selling cooking oil, sugar, breads, etc. for three years. Her business is well organized and she works from 5 a.m. until 7 p.m. every day. Consilde has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more bread, salt, sugar and rice in larger quantities. With the resulting profit, Consilde and her team will be able to save for their future and pay their children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more cooking oil, sugar, breads and other items.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is a 56-year-old married man with four children. He owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. Johnson has been farming for twenty years. His hardship is weather variations. His goals are to improve his methods of farming and to educate his children. Johnson needs this loan to buy coffee and hybrid cows

loans.use: to buy coffee and hybrid cows

loans.name: Tofiq

texts.en:
Tofiq is 30 years old. He is married and the father of two children. Tofiq is an optimistic, hardworking father. He works his land with love and dedication every day, so that it produces excellent vegetables. 

Tofiq has been in the agriculture business for more than five years. In fact, he draws strength and vitality to make his products the best in the city. His loving wife is also engaged in this business. Though growing vegetables is a very difficult and time consuming job, he hopes to gather a rich harvest. He is planning to fix the house and save enough money for the well-being of his family. For this purpose, he is requesting a loan of 1,000 Azerbaijani New Manat (AZN).

loans.use: to purchase organic seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Safari

texts.en: Safari is a 40-year-old widower with four children. He owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in clothes for men for 20 years. He started with the capital of 50,000 shillings and now has 6,000,000 shillings. His hardships are bad debtors and low sales during Lent season. His vision is becoming a wholesaler plus educating his children.

loans.use: to buy clothes for men.

loans.name: Gulnar

texts.en:
Gulnar is a mother of three children. She is a very honorable and resolute woman. Ever since she was a young girl, she learned the honest work of raising cattle -- knowledge she has passed down to her own children, who have also managed to improve their quality of life. 

Gulnar and her husband started their livestock business with only one cow seven years ago. After a number of sacrifices, they were able to increase little by little the quantity of calves. At the moment, with the support of their children, they have started to produce milk from their cattle. They sell it on the weekends in their village. 

Currently, Gulnar wants to expand her business and to purchase more cattle. With the desire of improving their living conditions, she applied for a 1,000 Azerbaijani New Manat (AZN) loan.

loans.use: to purchase two cattle.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is married and blessed with one child. He has been managing a retail shop for the last seven years to make a living. He is also employed as a tan-boy (a trucker's assistant). 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has improved his business. In the next five years, he wants to expand his business. Samuel dreams of operating a taxi business in the future. He is requesting a loan of 70,000 Kenya shillings to buy sugar, wheat flour and soap for resale.

loans.use: To buy sugar, wheat flour and soap.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary wants a loan to buy a grinding machine. The responsibility of looking after the family rests on her, and her desire is to educate her children. She prepares and packs simsim (sesame) and groundnut paste, and has been in business for a year. She has been pounding groundnuts using a pedal, and in a quest to increase her output, she desires a grinding machine.

loans.use: to buy a grinding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase one cow and two baby calves

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en el distrito de Wanchaq de la provincia de Cusco del departamento de Cusco.

La socia Elizabeth nació en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 40 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 2 hijos, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con el pequeño negocio de crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, pollos y conejos castillos. Elizabeth también tiene una pequeña tienda agro - veterinaria pero el local es alquilado. Ya son seis años que se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de animales menores. En esta oportunidad Elizabeth requiere el préstamo para implementar la mini granja. 

La socia Elizabeth está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth belongs to the “Union, Fuerza, y Amistad” (Unity, Strength, and Friendship) communal bank.  The bank meets once a month in the Wanchaq district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Elizabeth was born in the city of Cusco.  She is 40 years old, in a common-law-marriage, and has two children.  She alternates her household activities with a little business raising small animals like guinea pigs, hens, chickens, and “conejos castillos” (a breed of rabbit with white fur, red and blue eyes, and used for its meat production).

Elizabeth also has a small Agro-vet stO., but the place is rented.  She has been buying and selling small animals for six years.

At this time Elizabeth needs the loan to set up a mini farm.

Elizabeth is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to set up a mini farm.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a hardworking 31-year-old businessman.  He is married and blessed with one child who is still in school. For the last five years, he has been doing vehicle repairs to support his family.  He has employed one person to help him to run the business.  Even though he runs his business in a competitive environment, he is able to retain his customers because of his good services.  Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has become more financially stable. In the next five years, he wants to expand his business. He is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy spare parts.

loans.use: To buy spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase one dairy cow and two baby calves

loans.name: Keki Group

texts.en:
Maganga, who is in his mid 30s, is married with two children who are still going to school. He has been a food vendor who sells dry food like rice, sugar, wheat flour and beans for six years now.  He works from 6 am to 8 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use to increase stock in both businesses. His dream is to one day be able to become an international businessman.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Keki", which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more fresh and dry foods to sell.

loans.name: Melina Sabina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Melina Sabina; ella tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como empleada en un hotel, la socia también trabaja como vendedora de productos de belleza como lápiz labiales,cremas,perfumes y lápiz deliniadores,ella vende en forma independiente y ene l trabajo del hotel la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio y de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza y mejorar en su trabajo en el hotel. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza como cremas, lápiz labial y perfumes.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member, Melina Sabina, 55, is single and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her job at a hotel.  She also works selling beauty products such as lip pencil, lotions, perfume, and lip liner.  She sells independently and has the hotel job.  Melina Sabina works from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m.  With this business and her job she gets her children ahead.

Melina Sabina wants to expand and improve the business selling beauty products and improve in her hotel job.  She is requesting the loan to buy beauty products such as lotions, lip pencil, and perfume.

Melina Sabina is happy about the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: to buy beauty products such as lotions, lip pencil, and perfume.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Mario tiene 38 años de edad, es casado con cuatro hijos.

Él se ha dedicado toda la vida a la agricultura, sembrando maíz, fríjol, maicillo, etc. Estas actividades fueron aprendidas de sus padres. Él debe adquirir los insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes y abono para el maíz, por lo que debe recorrer unos 18 kilómetros desde su comunidad hasta el lugar donde los compra en autobús.

El señor Mario solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para la compra de fertilizantes, para el cultivo de maíz y para pago de mano de obra. Esto le permitirá obtener una buena cosecha y garantizar la alimentación de su familia, él venderá una parte de la producción para cancelar el préstamo y la otra la ahorrara, ya que él desea mejorar su casa e instalar la energía eléctrica. Además de proporcionarles a sus hijos la educación y seguir trabajando con Fundación Campo.
texts.en:
Mario, 38, is married and has four children.  He’s spent his entire life farming; he grows corn, beans, sorghum, etc.  He learned these activities from his parents.  He must acquire farming supplies like fertilizer and manure for the roots and to do so he must take an 18 kilometer bus trip from his community to the place where he buys his supplies.

Mario is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy fertilizer for his corn crops and to pay labor costs.  This will allow him to have a good harvest and guarantee his family’s food.  He will sell part of his production to repay the loan and will save the other part because he wants to make some home improvements; he wants to install electricity in addition to providing schooling for his children and continuing to work with Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a hardworking businesswoman aged 28. She is married and blessed with one child who is still in school. For the last three years, she has been selling clothes to make a living. She also does farming to increase her income. In the next five years, she wants to manage a boutique. Agnes is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy more clothes for resale.

loans.use: To buy clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics and groceries for resale

loans.name: C9293  Inkotanyi Cyane Group

texts.en: Frederique is 48 years old and married with four children between the ages of 2 and 15 years old. Frederique is the leader of a group called Inkotanyi cyane and this group is commonly known for selling animals. Frederique has three years' experience and his business hours are from 6 am until 8 pm every day. Frederique is in the middle in this group. Frederique and his team have requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand their businesses by purchasing more animals (goats, cows and sheep) to sell. If successful, Frederique and his team will hopefully earn more profits, which in turn will allow them to keep reinvesting for better financial stability. They will continue improving their families' lifestyles.

loans.use: to purchase more animals: goats, cows, sheep, etc

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
El señor Sabino tiene 64 años de edad, esta acompañado, y vive con sus cuatro hijos (todos menores de 18 años).

Sabino se dedica a la agricultura, particularmente al cultivo de maíz, maicillo, y frijol. Este oficio lo aprendió de sus padres, con quienes cultivaba hasta 24,500 metros cuadradros. Todas las labores de cultivo las elaboraba la familia, sin emplear a nadie. Actualmente Sabino cultiva con la ayuda de su esposa y sus hijos. Sabino tambien tiene vacas, toros, y terneros para la producción de leche para la venta.

Sabino ha pedido un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de madera y láminas de zinc para mejorar el techo de su vivienda. Actualmente la madera que soporta el techo esta en mal estado, y las láminas dejan entrar el agua a la casa cuanda llueve. Con la ayuda del préstamo Sabino podra proporcionar una vivienda más comoda y segura para su familia, evitando problemas de salud causados por la humedad.

Sabino desea seguir mejorando su vivienda. Inicialmente la casa fue construida enteramente de láminas de zinc (paredes y techo). Poco a poco Sabino pudo construtir las paredes de cemento que ahora tiene. Sabino desea en un futuro construir su casa totalmente,instalar piso de cemento (actualmente es de tierra), y colocar soportes de hierro en el techo.
texts.en:
Sabino is 64 years old.  He has a companion and lives with his four children (all under the age of 18).  Sabino’s a farmer, particularly corn, sorghum and beans.  He learned this occupation from his parents with whom he farmed 24,500 square meters.  All of his farming chores were done by the family without having to hire anyone.  Currently, Sabino farms with help from his wife and children.  He also has cows, bulls and calves to produce milk to sell.

Sabino has asked Fundación Campo for a loan to buy lumber and metal sheeting to improve his roof. Currently, the wood that holds up the roof is in poor condition and the metal sheets let water seep through when it rains.  With help from the loan Sabino will be able to provide a more comfortable and safe home for his family preventing health problems caused by the dampness.

Sabino wants to continue improving his house.  Initially it was built entirely of metal sheets (walls and roof).  Gradually, Sabino has been able to build the walls out of cement.  He wants eventually to build the house completely and install a cement floor (it’s currently dirt) and to install iron roof supports.

loans.use: to buy lumber and metal sheeting to repair his roof.

loans.name: Gbedokpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBEDOKPO est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Marie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Marie est âgée de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Marie est mariée à un boucher du nom de Paul. Le couple à deux enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge. Marie n'a jamais été à l'école. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Marie prépare de la nourriture (riz, pâte, accompagné de la sauce) qu'elle vend depuis deux ans. Marie s’approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Marie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBEDOKPO un deuxième crédit. Le premier crédit reçu a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
GBEDOKPO Group is made up of three women who are friends. They are seeking their second loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their businesses.

The group's representative, named Marie, is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 31 years old and lives in Benin. She's married to a butcher named Paul.

The couple has two school-attending children they have to support. Marie never attended school. In order to provide for herself and her children, she's been preparing and selling food (rice and pasta served with sauces) for two years.

Marie gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. Eager to satisfy her customers and increase her revenue and income, she's seeking a second loan, together with the other members of the group. The first loan was repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy meat, corn, rice, and condiments for sauce

loans.name: Moustapha

texts.fr: Monsieur Moustapha habite au Sénégal. Il est âgé de 32 ans. Il est célibataire et évolue dans le secteur du commerce plus précisément  dans la vente de friperie.  C’est après avoir perdu son emploi  que son frère  a commencé à lui envoyer des habits de friperie. Son point fort est qu’il vend à des prix abordables qui sont a la portée de toutes les bourses. Il est membre d’un des  guichets  de l’U-IMCEC  depuis mai 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000frs prévu pour l’achat de plus de marchandises en vue de développer d’avantage son activité de commerce. L’augmentation de ses bénéfices lui permettra de mieux participer dans les dépenses familiales car il vit sous toit de son frère.
texts.en: Moustapha lives in Senegal and is 32 years old. He is single and is developing a trading business, more precisely in the sale of second-hand clothing. When he lost his job, his brother started sending him second-hand clothes. His strength lies in the fact that he sells his goods at affordable prices which are accessible to all budgets. He has been a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC since May 2011. He is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs with which he is planning to buy more goods in order to expand his business. An increase in his profits will allow him to contribute more to family expenses, since he is living in his brother's house.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing for resale

loans.name: Keziah

texts.en: Keziah is a determined business woman who is 39 years old. She is married and blessed with three children, all of whom attend school. She has been selling animal feed for the last eight years to support her family. Previously, she was a farmer. Keziah has maintained her business because of her good reputation with her customers. In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy a cow.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Rodrigo Armando

texts.es:
A sus 59 años de edad Rodrigo es un emprendedor que a pesar de su deficiencia académica decidió montar su propio negocio, desde hace 40 años se dedica a la elaboración de materas de cemento. Día a Día sueña con brindarle a sus3 hijos un mejor futuro por lo que trabaja con gran esmero para ver progresar su microempresa.

Actualmente Rodrigo necesita hacer algunas adecuaciones locativas y comprar materia prima para la fabricación de sus productos, sin embargo no cuenta con el capital para invertir en dichas compras por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita aumentar la capacidad de producción, mejorar las ventas y sus ingresos, así mismo mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: At 59, Rodrigo is an entrepreneur who despite a lack of schooling decided to start his own business.  For the past 40 year he has mixed elements to make cement. Every day he seeks to provide a better future for his 3 children and gives his all to make his business a success.  Rodrigo seeks a loan to buy the raw materials for cement and also make some needed adaptations.  This credit will allow him to increase his production and sales, which will result in a better quality of life for his household.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for cement and make needed adaptations

loans.name: Frayner Antonio

texts.es:
Desde hace 5 años Frayner tiene una microempresa de confección donde trabaja en compañía de su esposa, júntos sueñan con brindarle un mejor futuro a su hijo de 5 años, día a día se levantan con gran motivación para sacar su negocio adelante.

Actualmente luchan para lograr un progreso notable en las utilidades del negocio, y para ello deben comprar materia prima en mayor cantidad como, hilos, telas, accesorios, y otros insumos necesarios para la confección, así agilizarán los procesos y se aumentará la producción, sin embargo no cuentan con el capital necesario para la compra de dichos insumos, por lo que solicita un crédito con el cual comprar materia prima suficiente para aumentar la capacidad de respuesta al cliente, mejorar las ventas y generar mas ingresos, así su calidad de vida mejorará y el futuro de su hijo cada vez será más prometedor.
texts.en: Five years ago Frayner started a small sewing business with the help of his wife.  Together they dream of providing a better future to their 5-year old son, and each day they work hard to make their initiative a success.  In order to grow their business and increase production they need a quantity of wholesale materials, but have not had the capital to buy them.  For this reason they seek this loan to increase sales and production and generate increased revenues to provide for their son an dincrease their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase sewing thread, cloth, and other accessories for her sewing business

loans.name: Trabajando Por El Futuro Group

texts.es: Mariluz es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Trabajando por el Futuro” grupo conformado por 10 personas  entre hombres y mujeres dedicadas a diversas actividades comerciales. Mariluz  tiene 61 años de edad y su familia está conformada por ella su esposo y 3 hijos independientes. Mariluz es profesora de matemática en un colegio de su comunidad, también cuenta con un negocio de compra y venta de joyas, este negocio nació con la idea de mejorar su economía y de esta manera generar utilidades para su familia. A pesar de todas las adversidades que se le  presentaron, ella se siente orgullosa ya que ha logrado que sus hijos sean profesionales. El deseo de Mariluz es de seguir trabajando positivamente, es por ello que con el fin de seguir creciendo en su negocio solicito el préstamo a EDAPOSPO para comprar joyas ya que tiene pedidos por entregar. La Alcancía Comunal “Trabajando por el Futuro” están muy agradecidos con el crédito brindado ya que hacen posible su progreso. Luis no pudo estar presente por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Mariluz is a member of the “Trabajando por el Futuro” (Working for the Future) communal bank that has 10 members, both men and women, working in a variety of commercial activities.  Mariluz is 61 years old and her family comprises her husband and three independent children.  Mariluz is a mathematics teacher at a local school and also has a business buying and selling jewelry that arose as an idea of a way to improve her economy and generate profits for her family.

Despite all the adversities that arose, she is proud that her children became professionals.  Mariluz would like to continue to work positively and in order to continue growing in business has asked EDAPROSPO for a loan to buy jewelry since she has pending orders to fill.

The Trabajando por el Futuro communal bank members are very grateful for the loan granted that makes their business’ progress possible.  Luis was unable to be present because of work.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 58 años, es una mujer responsable, amable y muy dinámica, esta casada y fruto de su matrimonio tiene un hijo que ya es mayor e independiente. Juntos habitan en sucasa propia y cada día que pasa dan lo mejor de sí para tener una mejor calidad de vida. EL trabajo de Elena es muy practico, ella posee dos mototaxi, de los cuales uno lo trabaja su esposo y otro lo alquila. Sus vehículos motorizados lo tienen en su casa, y es ahí que desde muy temprano su esposo y la persona a quien alquilan el otro vehículo, parten de su casa para dirigirse a la calles en busca de pasajeros para desplazarlos de un lugar a otro. Tiene tres años con este trabajo, y en todo este tiempo de trabajo solo se ha dedicado en administrar el dinero, mientras que su esposo es el que maneja la moto. Sin embargo cuando sus vehículo necesitan de mantenimiento mecánico ella se encarga de llevarlos a reparar y correr con los gastos. Por ahora le esta yendo bien, aún que sufrió anteriormente el robo de uno de sus vehículos, pero pudo recuperarlo a tiempo y ahora cuentan con todas las precauciones posibles para seguir con su labor. Su plan es contar con capital para comprar otro vehículo motorizado. Este será el crédito número once con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará la documentación reglamentaria para sus vehículos que tienen que renovar cada año, entre ellos el SOAT, la tarjeta de circulación, actualizar las licencias, y refaccionar algunas piezas de sus vehiculos.
texts.en:
Elena, 58, is a responsible, kind and very dynamic woman.  She’s married and has a son who is an independent adult now.  They live together in her house and every day that goes by they give their best to have a better quality of life.  Elena’s work is very practical.  She owns two mototaxis; her husband drives one of them and she leases out the other one.  She keeps her motorized vehicles at home so very early in the morning her husband and the person she leases the other vehicle to leave home to seek out passengers to take from one place to another. 

She’s been in this work for three years and during all this time she’s only been in charge of administering the money while her husband is the one who drives the motorcycle.  However, when her vehicles need mechanical servicing she takes care of taking them to be repaired and she covers the costs.  For now, she’s doing well although she recently had one of her vehicles stolen but was able to recover it in time and now she has all necessary precautions to continue working.  Her goal is to have enough capital to buy another motorized vehicle.

This will be her 11th MFP loan so she’s hoping for support from each one of you.  She will use the requested amount to pay for the required licensing documents for her vehicles that have to be renewed each year, among them the SOAT [insurance], the registration, updating license plates and to replace some of the parts in the vehicles.

loans.use: to renew her vehicle registration, pay insurance and buy replacement parts for her vehicles.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy is single and blessed with one child. For the past year, she has been managing a green grocer to make a living. She has improved her business with her previous loans from Faulu Kenya. In the next five years, she wants to become more financially stable. She is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy vegetables and fruit for resale.

loans.use: To buy vegetables and fruit.

loans.name: José Leonel

texts.es:
El señor Leonel tiene 26 años de edad, es casado con dos hijos.

Él se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura a sembrar maíz, fríjol y maicillo. Su papá fue quien le enseño a trabajar en la tierra ya que son personas humildes, responsables con valores y principios. Para comprar los insumos agrícolas se debe trasladar desde su comunidad hasta la ciudad viajando en autobús por 18 kilómetros.

Don Leonel esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar  teja y lamina para mejorar su casa, ya que en época de lluvia se  moja su casa y tienen problemas, de esta manera el podrá brindarle a su familia seguridad y que ellos se sientan bien y puedan vivir mas tranquilos.

Don Leonel tiene pensado que en unos años el construirá su casa de adobe, por que actualmente vive en una casa de bahareque y él desea dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leonel, 26, is married and has two children.  He’s spent his entire life farming corn, beans and sorghum.  His father taught him how to work the soil since they are humble, responsible people with good values and principles.  In order to buy his farming supplies he must travel from his community to the city on an 18 kilometer bus trip.

Leonel is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy roofing tile and metal sheeting to improve his house because during the rainy season his house gets wet and they have problems.  This way he will be able to provide his family with more safety so that they will feel good and be able to live more peacefully.

Leonel intends in a few years to build his house out of adobe because it’s currently made of “bahareque” (sticks interlaced with mud) and he wants to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy roofing tile and metal sheeting for his house.

loans.name: Duo Luchando Por La Vicion Group

texts.es: Duo Luchando por la Vision.este duo esta formado por dos personas muy buenas y responsables,uno de ellos es don,Oscar Samuel,de 50 años quien se dedica a la venta y confeccion de ropa para dama,caballero,y niño.el inicio su venta hace 12 años,nos comenta que este negoscito le a ayudado mucho con el sustento de su hogar,y le da gracias a Dios por que le a dado la oportunidad de tener este negocio,el esta solicitando este credito para la compra de tela y ropa variada,y en diferentes estilos,ya que sus clientes le piden nuevos estilos,al igual que don Pedro,porque el tambien se dedica a la misma actividad que don Oscar,el sueño de ellos es tener un local mas grande para obtener mejores ingresos, asi de esa manera ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: The communal bank "Duo Luchando por la Visión" is comprised of two very good, responsible people.  One of them is Oscar Samuel, 50, who makes and sells women's, men's and children's clothing.  He started his sales business 12 years ago and says it has helped him support his family; and he gives thanks to God for the opportunity to have the business.  He is requesting a loan to buy fabric and varied clothing in different styles because his customers want new fashions.  Pedro is in the same business as Oscar and their dream is to one day have a larger shop and earn a better income so they can help their families.

loans.use: To buy women's, men's and children's  to sell.

loans.name: El Cielo Group

texts.es:
El Grupo el cielo lo conforman tres féminas trabajadoras la coordinadora del grupo es la señora Benicia quien desde hace 11 años tiene una pulpería la cual inicio para salir adelante y poder cuidar a sus hijos. Ella invertirá el crédito en la compra de granos básicos, gaseosas…etc.
Las otras dos integrantes son Katia Lucia quien tiene una fritanga e invertirá en carne, aceite, repollo, arroz…etc. y Karla Vanessa tiene un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
The “El Cielo” group consists of three hardworking women.  The group coordinator is Benicia who has had a grocery store for the last 11 years.  She started it to get ahead and be able to care for her children.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains, soft-drinks, etc.

The other group members are Katia Lucía who has a fried fast food business and will invest in meat, oil, cabbage, rice, etc. and Karla Vanessa who owns a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft-drinks, etc.

loans.name: Yadira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yadira, una joven de 21 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Managua pero habita en el departamento de Estelí, es madre soltera. Ella es comerciante, tiene una pequeña pulpería ubicada frente a un colegio de primaria, comenzó este negocio debido a que tenía buscar una medio de subsistencia para ella y su hijo que ahora tiene de 5 años de edad, pues se convirtió en madre a muy temprana edad, y no tenia como conseguir para solventar los gastos que le generaba su hijo, su madre la apoyo y junto con ella pusieron una pulpería . Hoy en día tienen 3 años de tenerla, ella y su mama administran este negocio, donde ambas se turnan para atenderlo.
Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar inventario tales como leche, huevo, cereales, snacks, jugos, sodas, aceite, arroz, frijoles, jabones de limpieza. Con esta inversión podrá ofrecer mas productos sus clientes bridarles un servicio mejor, mejorar sus ventas, pues el objetivo de ella es que su negocio crezca y poderlo convertir en una miscelánea de productos varios, que cumpla con las necesidades de su vecindario.
texts.en:
Yadira, 21, is from the city of Managua but now lives in Estelí Department.  She’s a single mother.  She’s a merchant; she has a small grocery store located across from an elementary school.  She started the business because she had to find a way to support herself and her son who is now 5 years old because she became a mother at a very young age and had no way to cover expenses generated by her son.  Her mother helped her out and they opened a grocery store.  Today, they’ve had it for three years.  She and her mother run it and they take turns taking care of it.

She requested the loan to buy stock merchandise like milk, eggs, cereals, snacks, juices, soft-drinks, oil, rice, beans and cleaning supplies.  With this investment she’ll be able to offer more products to her customers and provide better service and improve sales for her objective is that her business grows to turn it into a variety store with varied products to meet her neighborhood’s needs.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Flor Mirtaly

texts.es:
Flor, se decidió a solicitar un nuevo préstamo debido a mejorar su vivienda, aprovechando que ya tiene un buen historial crediticio, solicita nuevamente, para la compra de materiales de construcción como laminas, tejas y madera para la construcción del techo de la vivienda.
Los préstamos le han ayudado para mejorar su condición, apoyando siempre a su hijo en los estudios y viendo la manera de salir adelante, el cambio que ha tenido en la familia, es el avance de su hijo en la educación.
texts.en:
Flor decided to request a new loan to carry out home improvement since she has a good credit record.  This loan will be used to buy construction materials such as metal sheet, tiles and wood to build a roof on her house.

The loans have helped improve her living conditions.  She is always helping her son with his studies and finding ways to get ahead.  The family has changed since her son has advanced in his education.

loans.use: To buy metal sheet, tiles and wood to build a roof.

loans.name: Nelson Ovidio

texts.es:
El señor Nelson tiene 21 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo.

Él se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura a sembrar maíz, fríjol, maicillo y trabaja como jornal. Es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora.

Don Nelson esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar lamina, madera y pago de mano de obra, ya que desea construir un corredor de adobe. Para comprar los materiales, que necesita para la construcción deberá trasladarse desde su comunidad hasta la ciudad viajando en autobús por 18 kilómetros.

Con la construcción él mejorara su casa, brindándole a su familia seguridad y que ellos se sientan bien y puedan vivir más tranquilos, ya que él desea que sus hijos se desarrollen en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Nelson, 21, lives with his life companion and their son.  He’s been a corn, bean and sorghum farmer and also works as a day laborer.  He’s an honest, responsible, hardworking person.

Nelson is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy metal sheeting and lumber and to pay labor costs because he wants to build an adobe corridor.  In order to buy the building materials he needs he has to go from his community to the city taking an 18 kilometer bus ride.  With the construction he will improve his house providing his family with more security so that they will feel good and live more peacefully because he wants his children to grow up in good conditions.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: El Progreso De La Aviacion Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama  El progreso de la aviación está conformado por diez integrantes de la misma comunidad con deseos de salir adelante y  tener un negocio propio, la mayoria son mujeres independientes que le gusta superarse y luchar para ser felices.
La representante de este grupo es la señora  Otilia quien se dedica a la venta de  de zapatos desde hace siete meses le  gusta mucho su  negocio por que tiene  muchos clientes  y da sus zapatos en pagos para que así  sus clientes ahorren para pagarle.
Es una señora  trabajadora  no está  casada y no tiene hijos pero tiene sobrinos y hermanas quienes viven con ella y está muy contenta  trabaja de  secretaria y tiene su propio negocio de zapatos.
Pidió el préstamo para  comprar más calzado como son: zapatillas, tenis y huaraches ya que es lo que más se vende.
Los otros integrantes se llaman:
Cristina Magdalena- se dedica a la venta de comida.
Wendolid  Viridiana- se dedica a la venta de tamales.
Rosalba – se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Rossana- se  dedica   a la venta de comida.
Felipe – se dedica  a  la  venta  de perfumes.
Aurea – se   dedica  a  la venta de ropa.
 Isidra  -  se dedica  a  la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Vilma Flor -  se  dedica  a  la  venta  de tamales.
Cenobia  - se dedica  a   la   venta de tamales.

Le dan las  gracias a fundación por la confianza y el apoyo que le ha dado dios y la fundación para salir adelante y triunfar en un futuro.
texts.en:
This group is called “El Progreso de la Aviación” and has ten members from the same community who want to get ahead and have businesses of their own.  Most are independent women who like to improve themselves and strive to be happy.

The group representative is Otilia who has been selling shoes for the last seven months.  She likes her business very much because she has many customers and she sell her shoes in installments to that her customers can save up to pay her.  She’s a hardworking woman who is unmarried and has no children but she does have nieces, nephews and sisters living with her.  She’s very happy.   She’s employed as a secretary and also has her own shoe business.  She requested the loan to buy more footwear like sandals, tennis shoes and huaraches which are the best sellers.

The other members are:

Cristina Magdalena- sells food.
Wendolid  Viridiana- sells tamales.
Rosalba – sells perfume.
Rossana- sells food.
Felipe – sells perfume.
Aurea – sells clothes.
Isidra  -  sells Mexican fast food snacks.
Vilma Flor -  sells tamales.
Cenobia  - sells tamales.

They thank the Fundación for the trust placed in them and for the support they’ve gotten form God and from the Fundación to get ahead and triumph in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva tiene 46 años, es una mujer muy alegre, dinámica y muy responsable, convive con su pareja y es madre de  cinco hijos de los cuales tres ya son mayores e independientes pero dos de elllos aún dependen de ella. Por tanto ella dedica en su educación, y juntos habitan en su casa propia. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de comida, es así que se se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado a buscar los mejores productos que serán la materia prima para le preparación de los alimentos, entre ellos están las verduras frescas, frutas dulces, carnes tanto de res como de pollo. Luego en su casa realiza la preparación de sus deliciosos platillos, y del que muchos de sus clientes gustan de ello. Tiene cinco años realizando esta actividad, y hasta la fecha ha trabajado sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener tiempo disponible para dedicarse a su casa, y a sus hijos, le esta yendo bien ya que tiene doble ingresos, pues además de la venta de comida, hace poco empezó alquilar su mototaxi y eso le genera más ingresos extras. Espera mas adelante mejorar la infraestructura de su local y así seguir brindando lo mejor a sus clientes. Este será el sexto crédito con MFP, esta contenta de pertenecer a este grupo ya que es muy unido y todos son muy responsables. Además esta muy agradecida por el apoyo que anteriormente le dieron y que espera una vez más apoyarlos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ingredientes, materia prima par la preparación de sus comidas, ya que desea aumentar la variedad de paltillos que ofrece.
texts.en:
Eva, 46, is a very cheerful, dynamic and very responsible woman living with her spouse; she’s the mother of five children three of which are already adults and independent but two of them are still dependent on her.  Because of this she sees to their education and they live together in her house.  

The work she does is selling food.  She rises very early to go to the market to look for the best products which will be the raw ingredients for her meal preparation.  Among them are fresh vegetables, sweet fruit, both chicken and beef.  She then prepares the delicious dishes at home that many of her customers love.  She’s been in business five years and to date has been working by herself.  What she likes about her work is having time available to dedicate to her home and to her children.  She’s doing well because she has two sources of income because besides selling food she recently started to lease her mototaxi and this generates extra income.  She hopes later on to improve the infrastructure of her locale to provide the best for her customers.

This will be her 6th MFP loan.  She’s happy to belong to this group that’s so united and all are very responsible.  Besides, she’s grateful for the support she got previously and hopes once again to support them.  She will use the amount requested to buy ingredients, raw materials, to prepare her meals since she hopes to increase the variety of dishes she offers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar, tiene la edad 54 de años, está casada y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el dinero va comprar unas vacas para la producción de leche. Don Oscar cuenta con el terreno apto para mantener estos animales y para poder alimentarlas de buena forma, además el cuenta con la experiencia de varios años en el cuido de ganado. El quiere obtener de estos animales un muy buen rendimiento en la producción de leche para el consumo de su hogar. El tiene como meta generar la leche suficiente para el consumo de su hogar y lo demás poder venderlo al mercado de la localidad generando así ingresos para su bienestar familiar y mejorar su calidad de vida día con día. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Oscar, 54, is married and lives with his wife and their 3 children, who are his main priority.  With this loan, he will buy some dairy cows for milk production.  Oscar has some land that is suitable for maintaining these animals, so he can keep them well fed.  In addition, he has a number of years of experience caring for livestock.  From these animals, he wants to get a high yield of milk for his home.  His goal is to generate enough milk so that he can provide for his household consumption, and also have enough to sell in the market in his town. In this way, he can generate income for his family's welfare and improve his quality of life over time.  This is the first loan that he has received through FUDECOSUR, and he has had no previous loans from state banks. Compared to those banks, FUDECOSUR has offered the best terms and lowest interest rate.

loans.use: to buy milk cows

loans.name: Rudy Wilson

texts.es:
Rudy, es ganadero, vive con una tía y un hermano, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado, está soltero, su ocupación con la ganadería la inicio ha ce 10 años, a él le gusta mucho este trabajo, su ganado es lechero y también lo vende para destazo, les dedica el tiempo completo.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo porque tiene la oportunidad de comprarse otra vaca, para la que no dispone de efectivo, dicho préstamo le servirá para realizar la compra y beneficiarse con un miembro más en la ganadería.
Su aspiración es mejorar su hato ganadero, ser propietario de ganadería lechera para distribuir en la zona, ampliándose en el sector.
texts.en:
Rudy is a farmer and lives with an aunt and a brother.  He is single, raises cattle, and has been in livestock farming for ten years.  He very much enjoys his work.  The cattle he has are dairy cows but he also sells cattle for butchering, so he works on a full time basis.

He is currently in need of a loan because he has the opportunity buy another cow but does not have the money.  The loan will help him make the purchase  and benefit from the addition to his farm.

His goal is to increase his livestock and be the owner of a dairy farm for distribution in his area so he can expand in the sector.

loans.use: To buy a cow his stable.

loans.name: Mario Alcides

texts.es:
Mario, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y es corralero, vive con su familia conformada por su esposa y dos hijos, actualmente Mario ha sembrado maíz en una manzana y media de terreno, es un cultivo grande al cual le dedica tiempo, y por las mañanas trabaja como corralero.
Por el momento la necesidad de Mario es la compra de dos sacos de abono, y dos litros de herbicidas, estos los aplicara al cultivo, uno pues para fortalecer el cultivo y el otro para prevenirlo de plagas.
Su aspiración es mejorar la casa, donde vive con su familia, también velar por las necesidades de sus hijos y darles la oportunidad de que estudien.
texts.en:
Mario grows corn and works in a corral.  He lives with his wife and two children.  Currently he has planted corn on an acre and a half of land, so the crop field is large and will require a lot of his time.  Also in the mornings he is a corral worker.

For now, Mario needs to buy two sacks of fertilizer and two liters of herbicides for his crop.  One will strengthen the crop and the other will prevent plagues.

His goal is to make improvements to the family house, provide everything necessary for his children and give them a good education.

loans.use: To buy two sacks of fertilizer and two liters of herbicides.

loans.name: Grâce Divine Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GRÂCE DIVINE est composé de trois personnes qui habitent dans la même maison. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Senon Virginie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Senon Virginie est âgée de 30 ans et vit au Bénin. Senon Virginie est mariée à un certain Fernand. Le couple à quatre enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge.Senon Virginie n'a jamais été à l'école. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants,Senon Virginie vend en gros des produits divers (lait, savons etc.) Senon Virginie s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Senon Virginie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GRÂCE DIVINE, un premier crédit.
texts.en:
GRÂCE DIVINE Group is made up of three women who live in the same building. This is the first time that the members of the group are seeking financial support from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their businesses.

The group's representative, named Senon Virginie, is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 30 years old and lives in Benin. She's married to one Fernand. The couple has four school-attending children to support.

Senon Virginie never attended school. In order to provide for herself and her children, she sells various products (milk, soaps, etc). She gets her supplies in Benin. Eager to satisfy her clientele and increase her revenue and income, she's seeking her first loan, together with the other members of the group.

loans.use: to buy various products (milk, soaps, etc)

loans.name: Maria Rebeca

texts.es:
María, actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar productos no perecederos como: enlatados, pastas, arroz, frijoles, aceite, detergentes y jabón, esta compra le ayudara a surtir el inventario. Este es un tercer prestamo para ella, los cuales le han servido para crecer en el negocio, el inventario que ahora maneja es mucho más grande al que inicio.
Su familia se mantiene, no ha aumentado, pero su condicion ha mejorado, ya que con este apoyo ha superado la situacion para ellos.
texts.en:
María is currently seeking a loan to invest in buying non-perishable merchandise such as canned goods, pasta, rice, beans, oil, soap and detergents. Purchasing these will help increase her inventory. This is María's third loan. The loans have helped her to expand her business, and the inventory which she now manages is much larger than what she first started with.

María's family has not grown, but their quality of life has improved. With the support she has received, María has been able overcome their previous situation.

loans.use: to purchase stock such as canned products, pasta, rice, beans, oil, detergents and soap

loans.name: Duo Mujeres Solidarias. Group

texts.es:
MUJERES SOLIDARIAS
Este grupo esta formado por doña Marcela D. 56 años D. edad casada y tiene 3 hijos,ella es la lider D. este duo tiene una tortillería desD. hace 15 años además tiene un poco D.  producto D. tienda como aguas gaseosas y lo venD., ella esta solicitando este crédito para poder Comprar maiz para su tortilleria  y aguas gaceosas y  vender mas y obtener ganancias, también esta doña Rosa Maria D. 36 años D. edad casada, y tiene 5 hijos, y se dedica a la fabricación y venta D. comales, desD. hace 25 años nos cuenta que necesita este crédito ya que ahora viene el tiempo D. fin D. año y es momento D. comprar comales y tenerlos listos ya que en ese tiempo se escasea porque muchos compran y los van a vender lejos entonces ya no hay y ella quiere prever eso y necesita este crédito confía en que fape le pueda seguir apoyando ya que el crédito anterior le fue D. mucha utilidad y este no digamos les piD. por favor la apoyen.
texts.en:
"Mujeres Solidarias" Group

This group is formed by Marcela and Maria. Marcela is 56 years old, married, and she has 3 children. She is the leader of this duo and she had had a tortilla production and sales business for more than 15 years. In addition she also has some grocery store merchandise that she sells, such as soft drinks. She requests a loan to purchase corn for her tortilla production business, and to purchase soft drinks to increase sales and obtain better profits. Also a member of this group is Rosa Maria. She is 36 years old, married, and she has 5 children. She has been producing and selling grills for the past 25 years. She tells us that she needs this loan because the end of year is approaching and it is the season when grills are bought by resellers and resold in distant places. She wants to have them ready for the season because she sells out with the high volume of sales and she wants to prevent this, and she needs this loan. She trusts that Fape (Kiva Field Partner) will continue to support her. The previous loan was a great help and this one will be too. She asks to please keep helping her.

loans.use: to purchase corn and sot drinks.

loans.name: David Santiago

texts.es:
A sus 25 años de edad David es un emprendedor que desde hace 3 años se encarga de la distribución y comercialización de hielo, labor que desempeña en discotecas, licoreras y salsamentarias del sector, su negocio está ubicado en bello, un municipio del departamento de Antioquia, allí es reconocido por el buen servicio y la agilidad en la entrega del producto.

Desafortunadamente desde hace 8 días su negocio se está viendo muy afectado pues la moto donde distribuía el hielo se la robaron y lo dejaron sin vehículo de transporte para su negocio. Hoy en día David no cuenta con el capital para comprar una moto nueva, y este motivo es el que lo obliga a solicitar un préstamo para la compra de dicha moto, pues es una herramienta básica para su negocio, ya que sus pedidos son de alta cantidad y sin un vehículo donde trasportar las ventas son mínimas. David sueña con ver crecer si negocio, y en un futuro cuando los ingresos se hayan incrementado llegar a tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Aged 25 years old, David is an entrepreneur who has been distributing and selling ice for 3 years. He delivers it to local nightclubs, liquor stores, and delicatessens. His business is based in Bello, a town in the department of Antioquia. He is well known there for good service and the responsiveness with which he delivers his product. 

Unfortunately, 8 days ago his business was badly affected when his scooter, which he uses for delivery, was stolen. His business was left without a means of transport. David does not have enough capital to buy a new scooter, and because it is an essential tool for his work, he finds himself obliged to seek a loan to purchase one. His order book is full but without a vehicle his sales are meagre. David dreams of seeing his business grow, and in future when his income has increased he will have a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy a scooter for delivering ice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, condiments, and cooking oil to make tamales

loans.name: Maria Maira De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mariscos: pescado, camarones, langostas, entre otras clases de mariscos, este préstamo le ayudara a tener mayor disponibilidad de productos para los clientes. Este es su segundo préstamo, el primero lo invirtió también en mariscos, pues este negocio es el que le ayuda a mantenerse y apoyar a su familia.
Con la inversión, logra mantener disponible dinero para realizar comprar periódicas de productos frescos, pues todos los días realiza las ventas y este producto es fácil de dañarse, por lo que el préstamo es una gran ayuda para mantener liquidez.
texts.en: Maria requests another loan to purchase seafood: fish, shrimp, lobster, and other types of seafood. This loan will help her to have more products available for her clients. This is her second loan. The first was also invested in seafood. This business is what helps her support herself and her family. With this investment will manage to have funds available to make periodic purchases of fresh products. She makes sales every day and this product is easily spoiled. This loan will be a great source of help for her to keep her business moving.

loans.use: to purchase fish, lobsters, and shrimp for her business.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia Teresa tiene 55 años D. edad y está casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene 3 hijos, ella tiene una pequeña tienda D. abarrotes, ella venD. productos D. primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar y leche también venD. golosinas, fideos, gaseosas entre otros productos más, ella también venD. productos D. belleza como por ejemplo cremas, colonias, perfumes entre otros más D. las líneas D. Avon, Unique y Dupre. La socia está feliz con sus negocios ya que mediante estas actividades ella pueD. estar más tiempo con sus hijos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. más mercadería como por ejemplo sacos D. arroz, sacos D. azúcar y otras cosas más. 

La socia pertenece al banco comunal” UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones del banco comunal son el distrito D. wanchaq D. la provincia del Cusco del departamento D. Cusco.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Teresa, 55, is married and has three children from this relationship.  She has a small grocery store.  She sells basic necessities such as, for example, rice, sugar, and milk, as well as sweets, pasta, and sodas, among other products.  At the same time, Teresa also sells beauty products like creams, cologne, and perfume, among other Avon, Unique, and Dupree products.  She is happy with her business since through these activities she can spend more time with her children.

Teresa is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise such as, for example, rice, sacks of sugar, and other things.

She belongs to Unión, Fuerza y Amistad Communal Bank.  The communal bank meetings are in the Wanchaq district in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco.

Teresa is happy about the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her businesses.

loans.name: Orlando Antonio

texts.es:
Orlando, se dedica a realizar reparaciones de escapes y radiadores de vehículos, él vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 15 y 4 años de edad, inicio el taller hace dos años, como una alternativa para generar ingresos y poder sostener a su familia.
Actualmente necesita realizar un pedido de radiadores y escapes, nuevo y usado, para mantener en el taller, su especialidad esta en estas reparaciones, por lo que es su necesidad disponer de ellos para realizar los trabajos.
La aspiración de él es que la clientela y sus ganancias aumenten, con la inversión que realizara, ya que siempre le gusta mantener un nivel de ingresos permanentes.
texts.en:
Orlando's occupation is to repair auto exhaust systems and radiators. He lives with his wife and their two children, aged 15 and 4. He started out his shop two years ago as an alternative way to generate an income and to support his family.

He currently needs to place an order for radiators and exhaust systems, both new and used, in order to keep in his shop. His specialty lies in these types of repairs which is why he needs to have this products in stock to carry out his work.

His aspirations are to increase his clientele and his profits with the help of the investment that he will make. He wants to always maintain a level of stable income.

loans.use: to purchase radiators and exhaust systems.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gregoria; La socia tiene 65 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 6 hijos los cuales son todos ellos independientes; La socia se dedica a la atención de sus picantería, este negocio consiste en la venta de comidas típicas llamadas extras y en la preparación de unas zarzas que son picantes a base de verduras y hortalizas, es una guarnición que acompaña a los diversos potajes, en este local también sirven la tradicional y famosa bebida que fuera de los incas llamada chicha, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus diversos potajes y de la chicha, para ello comprara maíz amarillo para la elaboración de la chicha. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de maiz amarillo para la elboracion de chicha y en insumos para preparar potajes.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Imasumac II communal bank, located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is Gregoria, 65, married, with 6 children who are all independent now.  She has a picantería (a restaurant where spicy food is sold)  where she sells typical food called “extras” and she makes some zarzas, a creole-onion condiment,  of vegetables and produce that are spicy.
