It’s a sauce that accompanies different stews.  In this area they make the famous and traditional Incan drink called “chicha”.  

She is requesting a loan to buy yellow corn to make chicha and ingredients to make vegetable stews.
Gregoria appreciates the loan and promises to make payments according to the schedule that has been set up.

loans.use: to buy yellow corn to make "chicha (a traditional Incan drink) and ingredients to prepare vegetable stews.

loans.name: Espoir Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ESPOIR est composé de trois membres qui sont des amies. La représentante de ce groupe du nom de Sèna Augustine est celle qui à une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupe sollicite pour une première  fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Sèna Augustine est âgée de 41 ans et est mariée à Razak, un revendeur. Le couple  a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. Sèna Augustine a arrêté l'école au cours primaire. Pour subvenir à ses différents besoins, Sèna Augustine mène comme activité la vente des friperies. A côté de cette activité Sèna Augustine fait le service traiteur.Sèna Augustine exerce cette activité depuis quatre ans.Sèna Augustine s'approvisionne dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle,Sèna Augustine et les autres membres du groupe ESPOIR sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Leur ambition est d’accroître le niveau de leur activité.
texts.en:
The 'ESPOIR' (Hope) group has three members who are friends.  The group's representative, called Sèna Augustine, is the lady raising her hand in the photo.  With the goal of boosting their businesses so that they can better meet their customer demand, this group are requesting the financial support of ALIDé for the first time.

Sèna Augustine is 41 years old and married to Razak, a re-seller.  The couple have one child in school who is in their care.  Sèna Augustine stopped attending school during her primary education.  In order to cover her different needs, she works selling used clothing.  In addition to this business, she also works as a caterer.  She has been in this business for four years.  She stocks up in the markets in Benin.  With the goal of strengthening their businesses and better satisfying their customers, Sèna Augustine and the other members of the ESPOIR group are requesting a loan from ALIDé.  Their ambition is to grow their businesses.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing

loans.name: Carmen Soledad

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Carmen Soledad; ella tiene 27 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, ella tiene un estudio contable donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de su trabajo la socia quiere seguir saliendo adelante, la socia quiere seguir estudiando y mejorar en su profesión de contadora. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar la maestría  de su carrera que está realizando en la universidad. 

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Carmen Soledad belongs to Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

She is 27 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her job as an accountant.  She has an accounting office where she works from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m.  By means of her job, Carmen Soledad wants to continue getting ahead.  She wants to continue studying and improve in her profession as an accountant.

She is requesting the loan to pay for the master's degree in her field that she is pursuing in the university.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: pay for the master's degree in her field that she is pursuing in the university.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase tomato and green pepper seeds.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos.

Ella es una mujer muy luchadora, desde hace seis años se dedica a la elaboración de pupusas, ella manifiesta que trabajo para otra persona y fue ahí donde aprendió a elaborar las pupusas. Pero Maria es visionaria y quiere tener su propio negocio, para lo cual manifiesta que necesita construir un chalet, donde las venderá y elaborara. 

La señora Maria antes de aprender a elaborar pupusas, trabajaba como jornal en una finca de café, cortando el café, limpiándolo y podando fincas, etc. Hoy en día ella tiene el objetivo de tener su chalet, por lo que esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar cemento, arena, bloque y pago de mano de obra, para construir el chalet y la otra parte la utilizara para comprar insumos para elaborar las pupusas y surtir el chalet y tener más producto que ofrecer a los cliente, ya que ella ha visto una gran oportunidad de obtener buenos ingresos, ya que en donde ella vive no hay un chalet donde vendan pupusas.

Por tal razón ella podrá brindarles a sus hijos una mejor condición de vida y de desarrollo, creando una cultura de ahorro, ya que de los ingresos que obtenga mejorara su casa construyendo una habitación más y que sus hijos continúen con sus estudios.

La señora Maria manifiesta seguir trabajando con Fundación Campo, su sueño es tener un negocio más fuerte y con mayores ingresos, al mismo tiempo continuar trabajando en las cortas de café ya que la temporada se acerca, de esta manera obtendrá otra fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old. She is a single mother with three children. 

She is a fighter and has been in the business of making pupusas (tortilla rellenas). She says she began in this field by working for someone else, and it was there she learned to make pupusas. But Maria is a visionary and she wants to have her own business for which she declares that she needs to build a little café where she could prepare and sell them. 

Before Maria learned to make pupusas, she worked as a day laborer at a coffee plantation, harvesting coffee, cleaning, and pruning and doing other miscellaneous chores. Today she has the objective of getting her café and this is the reason she is asking for a loan through Fundación Campo, in order to buy cement, sand, blocks and to pay to have the work done to build the café and also in order to buy supplies to make her pupusas and to stock the café and to have more products to offer her customers. She has already seen a great opportunity to earn a good income because nobody else is selling pupusas in her neighborhood.

In this way she could give her children a higher standard of living and she would create a culture of saving, since the income that she earns would improve their house from constructing an extra room where her children could continue with their studies. 

Maria says she plans to continue working with Fundación Campo. Her dream is to have a strong business with higher income and at the same time continue working harvesting coffee, as the season is approaching, and in this way have another source of income.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks and to pay the worker to build a little café, and the supplies she needs to make tortilla rellenas

loans.name: Maribel Cirila

texts.es:
La socia Maribel tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene 2 hijo, ella nació en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella tiene su negocio de venta de anticuchos y vende en su local anticuchos de carne, corazón res y entre otros mas y todo están cocidos en base de carbón a la parrilla, ella trabaja conjuntamente con su familia con papá y hermana y formaron una sociedad. 

La socia Maribel solicita el préstamo para la compra de más insumos para su negocio de anticucheria como por ejemplo aceite, carnes, carbón entre otras cosas más.

La socia Maribel pertenece al banco comunal” UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maribel está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maribel, 40, is married and has two children from this relationship.  She was born in the city of Cusco, where she works.  She has a business selling "anticuchos," grilled meat on a skewer.  In her place she sells meat and beef heart anticuchos, among other types, and all are cooked on a charcoal grill.  She works together with her family, with her father and her sister, and they formed a partnership.

Maribel is requesting the loan to buy more ingredients for her anticucho business, such as oil, meats, and charcoal, among other things.

Maribel belongs to Unión, Fuerza y Amistad Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for her business selling "anticuchos" (grilled meat on a skewer).

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: José, Continua en su taller de carpinteria, en esta ocacion solicita un prestamo para comprar madera de credo, pino y aceituno, este es su principal material para realizar su trabajo, confeccionando muebles para los clientes. Jose ha logrado mantenerse en sus actividades por la ayuda del prestamo anterior, ya que los materiales que compro le sirvieron para ejecutar trabajos,él espera que con la compra mejore la capacidad de respuesta a los clientes en los muebles que deseen y continuar trabajando de la misma manera en los prestamos.
texts.en: Jose continues to have his carpentry shop. At this time he requests a loan to purchase cedar, pine, and olive wood. These are the primary materials that he uses in his work, building furniture for his clients. Jose has managed to keep up his activities thanks to the previous loan. The materials which he purchased helped him to carry out project. He hopes that with this purchase he will be able to improve his ability to respond to his clients, in giving them the furniture which they require. He hopes to continue his work with the help of these loans.

loans.use: to purchase cedar, pine, and olive lumber.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Juana; La socia tiene 53 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 9 hijos los cuales solo 2 están con ella porque aun son estudiantes de 15, 13 años de edad, La socia se dedica  a la venta de leña, la socia tiene acopiado en casa leños los cuales están terminando de secar; la socia comprara palos para copiar en su almacén en casa y poder vender en trozos como leña. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de palos para la leña.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the ”IMASUMAC II” communal bank, located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco.
This is Mrs. Juana. She is 53, married, and has 9 children. Only two of her children live with her because they are still in school; they are 15 and 13 years old. Juana sells firewood. She has accumulated firewood in her home, and it is drying out. She will buy wood to stock her store, which is in her home, and to then sell in bundles for firewood. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of wood to be used as firewood.
She is grateful for this loan and promises to repay her quotas as planned.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of wood for firewood.

loans.name: Marcos Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marcos, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, ya que su negocio tiene bastante movimiento en el negocio y salen al mercado, nuevos estilos en cosméticos y artículos de uso femenino, los cuales le gusta mantener en su puesto de venta.
Este préstamo lo invertirá en compra de mercadería como prendedores, diademas, labiales, maquillajes, sobras para ojo, cepillo para el cabello, y cremas, esto le ayudara como siempre a mantener surtido el negocio y poder servirle a los clientes de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
Marcos decided to request a new loan. Her business has quite a bit of movement. New types of cosmetics and feminine articles come out in the market and she likes to keep them on her stand for sale. 

This loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise such as hair clips, hair bands, lipsticks, make-up, eye-shadows, hair brushes, and skin lotions. This will help her to always keep a good variety in her business and to serve her clients in a better way.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as hair clips, hair bands, lipsticks, make-up, and eye-shadows.

loans.name: Souadou

texts.fr:
Souadou abite au sud du sénégal,elle est agée de 35 ans.Elle s'est mariée à l'age de 25 ans sans enfant,jusque à nos jours.Elle achete des legumes à dakar.
Pendant 15 ans,elle fait le commerce pour soutenir sa maman et assurer ses visites medicale car elle pense 
toujours a avoir des enfants dans sa vie
Souadou avec son commerce,elle a acheté un terrain à Brin dont elle veut construir dans l'avenir.
texts.en:
Souadou lives in the south of Senegal and is 35 years old. She got married when she was 25 years old and has no children to date. She buys vegetables in Dakar. For the past fifteen years she has been trading in order to support her mother and pay for her own medical appointments, since she is still thinking of having children during her life.

Thanks to her business Souadou has bought a piece of land in Brin and wants to build on it in the future.

loans.use: to buy vegetables: cabbages, potatoes, gombos, aubergines,etc.

loans.name: Yana

texts.ru:
Яна – из Новой Каховки, Херсонский регион. Она уже 7 лет ведет небольшой бизнес по продаже товаров и инструментов для вышивки, а именно полотен, ниток, рамок и прочего. Она торгует в местном торговом доме «Центральный». На данный момент оборотный капитал составляет 20 000 гривен. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 5 000 гривен. 

Яна планирует использовать кредит в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы завезти новый ассортимент товаров для вышивки и сопутствующих товаров. Яне нравится заниматься именно этой группой товаров, потому что она сама рукодельница и умеет хорошо шить и вышивать. Благодаря собственному опыту она всегда может дать дельный совет покупателю, что помогает ей завоевывать все новых и новых клиентов. 
Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Yana is from Novaya Kahovka, Kherson region.  For seven years, she has been running a small business of selling embroidery goods and equipment, such as canvases, threads, frames, etc.  She sells at the local shopping house, called "Tsentralniy" (Central).  Currently, Yana's revolving capital amounts to 20,000 hryvnia.  Her monthly profit is 5,000 hryvnia.  Yana plans to use the loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia to obtain a new assortment of embroidery merchandise and accompanying goods.  Yana likes to deal with this specific group of goods because she is a needlewoman herself and can sew and embroider well.  Thanks to her own experience, she is always able to give a valuable advise to a customer, which helps her win more and more new clients.

loans.use: to obtain a new assortment of embroidery merchandise and accompanying goods

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yeny; La socia tiene 29 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo de 6 meses de edad; la socia es enfermera técnica y desea invertir el crédito en un negocio propio de venta de CDS, discos; la socia también desea utilizar la otra mitad en gastos personales en casa para el bebe; La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de discos compactos como Cds para vender en su negocio propio y la otra parte del dinero invertirá en gastos personales para su bebe.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yeny is a member of the community bank "IMASUMAC II," which is located in the Huanchac district in the Cusco province and department. 

Yeny is 29 years old, has a live-in partner, and a six-month old child; she is a vocational nurse. Yeny wants to invest the loan in her own business selling CDs. She also wants to use the other half for personal and household expenses for the baby. 

The member is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of discs, like CDs, to sell in her own business, and the other part of the money she will use for personal expenses for her baby. 

Yeny appreciates the loan and promises to make her payments in agreement with her payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy CDs to sell in her own business, and also to use for personal expenses for her baby.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Jhon Ferley

texts.es:
Desde hace 5 años Jhon Ferley se dedica a la cerrajería, labor que aprendió en un instituto de capacitación del municipio de Medellín en el departamento de Antioquia, hoy en día hace escaletas industriales, puentes, ventanas, rejas, y mas productos que sus clientes requieran. Jhon genera 1 empleo; su mayor sueño es llegara  tener un gran negocio donde genere mas empleos y que sea reconocido en el sector, pues así sabe que sus ingresos se incrementarán y podrá ayudarme a mucha mas gente.

Una de sus necesidades prioritarias en el momento es la compra de herramientas de trabajo, pero no cuenta con el capital para hacer dichas compras, por lo cual hoy solicita un crédito que le permita agilizar sus procesos de producción, y entrega del trabajo final, así los clientes estarán mas satisfechos con el servicio las ventas mejorarán y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida será mas prometedora.
texts.en:
For five years Jhon Ferley has been in the locksmith business.  He learned his trade at the municipal training institute in Medellín in the department of Antioquia.  Now he makes items such as industrial steps, bridges, windows, grilles and other products required by his customers.  Jhon generates one place of employment.  His greatest goal is to one day have a business that will generate more employment and be recognized in the sector.  He knows that that will increase his income and allow him to help many people.

On of his top priorities is to buy work tools, but he does not have the capital to do so.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan that will allow him to speed up his production process and delivery of the work orders so the customers will be satisfied with his service.  Sales will increase and his quality of life will be more pomising in proportion.

loans.use: To buy work tools for his locksmith shop.

loans.name: Joaquina

texts.es:
Joaquina es socia del Banco Comunal Rikchary, tiene 52 años, no tiene hijos y es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 10 años,
Joaquina vende pollos y huevo, tiene una tienda donde tambien vende licores y abarrotes en general, reparte a las bodegas pollo y huevo. Joaquina ha pasado por muchos negocios como restaurante. El primer préstamo ue recibió lo utilizó para poder comprar una congeladora para su negocio, poco a poco pudo progresar, y hacer su negocio, ahora con las capacitaciones y el ahorro que le enseñaron esta progresando y se siente muy orgullosa de ello. Con el préstamo que recibirá lo invertirá en la compra de pollo y bebidas.
Su gran meta es poder comprarse su casa, lo que desea es poder tener una buena estabilidad económica para poder adoptar a un niño que es lo que mas desea.
texts.en:
Joaquina is a member of the communal bank Rikchary.  She is 52 years hold, has no children, and has been a member of FINC Peru for ten years.

Joaquina sells chickens and eggs, which she delivers to other merchants, and has a store where she sells liquor and groceries.  She has also had other business such as a restaurant.  The first loan she received was used to buy a freezer for her business.  Little by little she has been able to get ahead and establish her business.  Now with the training and saving skills she was taught she feels proud.  She will use the loan to buy chickens and beverages.

Her greatest goal is to buy a house and have good economic stability so she can adopt a child.

loans.use: To buy chickens and beverages.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина – из города Хуст, на западе Украины. Она торгует тканями и фурнитурой в местном универмаге. Конкуренции, как таковой, особо нет. Товар пользуется спросом, есть своя клиентская база. В этом бизнесе Ирина находится уже 10 лет. На данный момент ее чистая прибыль составляет 7 000 гривен. 

Ирине необходимы дополнительные средства в размере 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы поехать за приобретением товара и пополнения оборотных средств. Ирину хорошо знают покупатели, потому что она всегда привозит качественный товар и никогда не предложит второсортный материал. Она дорожит своей репутацией честного предпринимателя. Получив дополнительную прибыль, Ирина надеется и в дальнейшем развивать свой бизнес, улучшая жилищные условия и еще активнее расширяя ассортимент товара. 
Пометка: история на РУССКОМ язык
texts.en: Irina is from the town of Khoost in the western Ukraine.  She sells fabrics and furniture at the local department store and has no significant competition.  Her merchandise is in demand, and she has her own client base.  Irina has been in this business for 10 years.  Her current net profit amounts to 7,000 hryvnia.  Irina needs additional funds in the sum of 5,000 hryvnia in order to travel and buy merchandise and refill her revolving capital.  She is well known among customers because she always brings in quality merchandise and would never offer a second-rate fabric.  She values her reputation as an honest entrepreneur.  After obtaining the additional profit, Irina hopes to develop her business further, improve living conditions and actively expand merchandise selection.

loans.use: to travel and buy merchandise and refill her revolving capital

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
El señor Salvador, tiene 22 años, esta acomapañado  y tiene  un hijo  de 2 años de edad. Hace 2 años tomo la decisión de empezar y establecer  su propio negocio de panadería (elaboración de pan francés). Él antes de poner este negocio, fue ayudante de panificador por 8 años y fue así como aprendió el negocio y decidió independizarse ya que vio la oportunidad de satisfacer una demanda insatisfecha en su colonia.   
El préstamo, será utilizado para reparar la galera en donde tiene el horno artesanal y su taller, resulta que el piso es de tierra y la lámina está dañada lo que provoca infiltración de agua en el invierno y también la generación de partículas de polvo en verano y charco o lodazal en invierno; es así como se hace necesario comprar laminas para techo y materiales como arena, cemento para fraguar el piso de tierra, también se comprarán bandejas para incrementar la producción de pan.
 El señor salvador se traslada tres veces por semana a la cabecera departamental a comprar la materia prima para el trabajo, estos días madruga ya que tiene que caminar 1 kilómetro para llegar hasta la calle principal que es donde pasa el autobús tardándose 2 horas en el viaje (ida y regreso). Cuando se baja del bus en el desvió, ya está su esposa esperándolo para trasladar el producto a su casa ya que no hay calle y lo hacen caminando por veredas y cargando el producto en sus espaldas.
 La elaboración del pan la realiza por la tarde y tiene el apoyo de su esposa y un ayudante adicional. Para vender el pan lo hace de manera personal sin ningún medio de transporte, utilizando un canasto caminando a pie por toda la colonia  y logrando así la venta del pan. Por ser un pan caliente y artesanal es preferido por sus vecinos y por esa razón tiene un mercado potencial. 
Don salvador nunca ha obtenido créditos, toda la inversión la realizo cuando trabajo de forma dependiente, pero hoy necesita el crédito para poder fortalecer su unidad productiva y de esa forma ser mas competitivo y lograr crecer con la venta de pan en lugares vecinos sobretodo mejorando la salubridad del taller. El anhelo  es que en un futuro pueda adquirir su propia casa ya que en este momento vive en casa de su suegro y siente  incomodidad por lo que sueña con darle mejores condiciones a su esposa, su hijo actual y otros que Dios le regale.
texts.en:
Mr. Salvador is 22, has a common-law wife and a 2-year-old son.  Two years ago he decided to set up his own bakery to make French bread.  Before starting the business he worked for eight years as a baker assistant and learned the trade.  He decided to become independent when he saw the opportunity to satisfy a demand not being met in his residential area.

The loan will be used to repair the galley where he has an artisan oven and workshop.  The floor is of dirt and the roof is damaged which causes water infiltration in the winter.  In summer it generates dust particles and in winter mud puddles, making it necessary to buy roofing sheet and materials such as sand and cement to put in a concrete floor.  He also wants to buy baking trays to increase bread production. 

Salvador travels three times a week to the department capital to buy raw material for his work.  On such days has to get up very early and walk a kilometer to get to the main street where the bus stops.  The round trip takes two hours.  When he returns his wife is waiting for him at the bus stop so they can carry the goods home on their backs through pathways since there is no street.
 
He bakes bread in the afternoon with the help of his wife.  He sells it door-to-door throughout the area from a basket he carries.  Since the bread is warm and specially made his neighbors prefer his product and there is a potential market.

Salvador has never received any loans.  He carried out his investment as a result of the work he used to have.  But now he needs a loan to strengthen his production capacity and become more competitive.  By improving his workshop's hygiene he can increase bread sales to nearby locations.  In the future he wants to buy his own house since now he lives with his father-in-law.  He is uncomfortable because he wants to provide the best living conditions for his wife, their son and any more children they may be blessed with.

loans.use: To buy roof sheet, sand, and cement to repair the bakery galley and to buy bread trays.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Sonia; La socia tiene 28 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 13 meses de edad; la socia es comerciante minorista, la socia tiene su stand en uno de los centros comerciales de la ciudad, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de ropa, la socia viaja a las diferentes ciudades a comprar de las fabricas ropa de bebes y los trae a vender en su stand. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa para bebe.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "IMASUMAC II", which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and deparment of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Sonia who is 28, married and has a 13-month-old son.  She is a retail merchant and has a stand in the city shopping center where she sells clothing.  She travels to different cities to buy baby clothes that she sells at her stand.  She is requesting a loan to buy infant clothing.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy baby clothes.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru:
Людмила замужем, у нее взрослые дети. Людмила живет и занимается своим делом в городе Каховка, Херсонская область. Она торгует женской одеждой на местном Каховском рынке вот уже 18 лет. На данный момент количества товара у нее – на сумму 60 000 гривен. 

Людмиле необходим кредит в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить теплую одежду на имеющуюся сумму, а именно купить оптом свитера, кофты, куртки и продать их по розничным ценам в своем киоске. Развитие бизнеса и стабильный доход дадут клиентке возможность содержать семью.  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Ludmila is married and has adult children.  She lives and runs her business in the town of Kahovka in the Kherson region.  Ludmila has been selling women's clothing at the local Kahovka market for 18 years.  Currently, the quantity of her merchandise is valued at 60,000 hryvnia.  Ludmila needs a loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia in order to buy warm clothing using this sum.  Specifically, she plans to buy sweaters, cardigans, jackets at wholesale prices and sell these goods at retail prices in her store.   Business development and stable income will provide our client with the opportunity to support her family.

loans.use: to buy warm clothing, specifically, to buy sweaters, cardigans, jackets at wholesale prices and sell these goods at retail prices in her store

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
El socio Mateo pertenece al banco comunal “UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento de Cusco.

El socio Mateo nació en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 67 años de edad y está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene 7 hijos pero uno de ellos falleció hace un tiempo atrás, él alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de anticucheria, él tiene su local donde vende anticuchos de corazón y carne estos hechos a la parrilla a base de carbón. Su local está abierto de lunes a sábado por las tardes, Mateo es quien administra en sociedad con sus dos hijas el negocio. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más insumos para su negocio de anticucheria como carne, aceite, carbón, sal entre otros más. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Sr. Mateo belongs to the Communal Bank “Union Fuerza Y Amistad” (Union, Strength, and Friendship), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He was born in the city of Cusco, is 67 years old, married, and has seven children but one of them died some time ago. Mateo divides his time between his daily activities and managing an “anticucheria” (a restaurant that serves grilled meats) where he serves skewered hearts and beef that are cooked over charcoal. His establishment is open Monday through Saturday in the afternoons. Mateo manages his business with his two daughters

He is requesting a loan to buy more supplies for his restaurant business such as meat, oil, charcoal, salt, and other items.

Mateo is happy with the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To purchase meat, oil, charcoal, salt, and other items.

loans.name: Janet

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Janet; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, la socia tiene un estudio contable donde trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere implementar su consultorio contable. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una computadora para su consultorio contable. 

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “HATUN RUMIYOC” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, in the province and department of Cuzco. 

Her name is Janet. She is 32 years old, married and has one son. She alternates her other daily activities with being an accountant. She has an accounting business where she works from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. With this job she gets her son ahead. She wants to outfit her accounting office and is asking for the loan to buy a computer for it. 

Janet is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a computer her accounting business.

loans.name: Erenia Maritza

texts.es:
Erenia de 50 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada  “Suburbio”.
El negocio de ella lo inicio hace 13 años, es un bazar ubicado en la parte delantera de  su vivienda.,
Ella inicio esta actividad con un pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas, e la cual con un pequeño capital incremento su negocio, ahora es un bazar.
El horario de ella es de lunes a viernes, inicia de las 8:00  hasta las 22:00.
La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia ya que su sector se ha tomado peligroso.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: lápiz, cuaderno, borrador, plumas, etc.
El sueño de ella es que con la bendición de Dios y la ayuda de banco D-Miro empiece a incrementar  su negocio en donde generar más ingreso de dinero
texts.en:
Erenia is 50 years old and lives in a suburb called "Suburbio". She started her own business 13 years ago. She runs a bazaar located in the front part of her house. She started this business with a small business selling soft drinks and which with a small capital investment she grew into what is now a bazaar. She works Monday through Friday from 08:00 until 22:00. The problem she faces is crime as her area has become dangerous.

She is asking for a loan to purchase merchandise such as: pencils, notebooks, erasers, pens, etc. Her dream is that with 'la bendicion de Dios' ('God's blessing') and the help of the communal bank D-Miro she can start growing her business in the areas that are the most profitable.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pencils, notebooks, erasers, pens, etc.

loans.name: Ines Lucila

texts.es:
Inés de  47 años, una mujer muy trabajadora y honrada, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Suburbio”. 
Su negocio es una pequeña tienda ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.  Ya que desde muy pequeña le gustaba el comercio.
Su horario de trabajo es de lunes a domingo, inicia de las 6:00am hasta las 23:00pm.
Su dificultad es que le falta mercadería, no tiene muchos suministros necesarias para la venta.
Ella solicita el préstamo para el incremento de su negocio, para la compra de mercadería  como: arroz, aceites, atún, etc. y el mejoramiento de su pequeño local que está ubicado en su vivienda.
Su sueño es que su tienda crezca y así pueda tener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Inés is 47 years old. She is a very hardworking and honest woman who lives in a suburb called "Suburbio". She has a small business located in the front part of her house, as since young she has liked business. She works from Monday to Sunday from 6:00am until 23:00pm. Her difficulty is that she doesn't have enough merchadise or supplies necessary to sell. 

She is asking for a loan to grow her business, to buy merchandise such as: rice, oil, tuna, etc., and improve the small locale located in her house. Her dream is that her business grow so that she can have a better income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, oil, tuna, etc.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Los Claveles, tiene 30 años y 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 7 años.
Mercedes fabrica ladrillos y los vende en Compañía, tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella empezó ayudando a sus padres, siempre tuvieron este negocio, ahora Mercedes tiene su propio capital, trabajan con máquinas pesadas que con mucho esfuerzo ha podido comprarse. En los momentos mas difíciles FINCA Peru le brindó el apoyo que necesitaba, solo trabaja con Finca y ya no es necesario ir a otro Banco, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá para poder contratar a dos peones mas para que puedan trabajar mas rápido porque ya vienen la época de lluvia y ahí es mas lento el trabajo. Su meta es poder construir su casa en Ayacucho.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the communal bank Los Claveles. She is 30 years old and has 2 children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last 7 years.

Mercedes makes bricks and sells them in Compañía. She has a grocery store. She started out by helping her parents as they always had this business. Now Mercedes has her own capital, working with heavy machinery that was purchased with a lot of hard work. In her most difficult moments, FINCA Peru gave the support she needed. She only works with FINCA and no longer needs to go to another bank. She will invest the current loan in hiring 2 more manual labourers so that they can work more quickly as the rainy season is coming and business is slower then. Her goal is to be able to build a house in Ayacucho.

loans.use: to hire 2 manual labourers.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Bibiana; La socia tiene 60 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo uno de ellos esta con la socia y estudia en la universidad él tiene 19 años de edad; La socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de verduras y de frutas, la socia tiene un stand en la esquina de sus barrio y ella compra muy temprano por la mañana o semanalmente frutas y verduras frescas, las cuales las vende en su stand y toda la mañana, la socia requiere el crédito para invertir en la compra de frutas y verduras del terminal frescas.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank ”IMASUMAC II”. The communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The member is Sra. Bibiana. She is 60 years old, married and has 7 children, only one of which lives with her and studies at the university. He is 19 years old. The member buys and sells fruit and vegetables. She has a stall at the corner of her neighbourhood. She buys her fresh fruit and vegbetables early in the mornings or weekly and then sells them at her stall all morning. The member needs the loan to purchase fruit and vegetables from the fresh produce terminal.

The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to make her repayments according to the schedule of payments.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables from the fresh produce terminal.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alexander; el tiene 29 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de taxi, el es propietario de un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo el socio quiere salir adelante, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi que brinda al público en general. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “HATUN RUMIYOC”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Sr. Alexander. He is 29 years old and single. The member divides his time between daily activities and his taxi service business. He owns a car which he uses as a taxi. The member works from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. The member wants to get ahead by means of this work. The member wants to improve his taxi service which he offers to the public in general. The member is asking for a loan to pay for the maintenance of his car and buy spare parts.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance on his car and buy spare parts.

loans.name: Las Rosas Del Puente Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las rosas del puente, decidieron ponerle este nombre porque una de las integrantes tiene un vivero de rosas. La historia es acerca de la señora Sofía, ella tiene 43 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Juan Miranda, tienen 6 hijos, de los cuales solo Remedios y Juan estudian, ellos están cursando segundo año de prepa y tercer grado de primaria. Sofia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y perfumes por catalogo.

Sofía decidió iniciar con este negocio, por que, quería buscar la manera de sacar a sus hijos adelante y para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y su educación, al igual que para  mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, invirtió el préstamo recibido en la compra de mas mercancía como son: catálogos, labiales, sombras, rubores, rimeles, mascaras, delineadores y cremas, desodorantes, perfumes, etc. para poder tener mas variedad de productos.

Ella esta muy contenta por que dice que le va muy bien con su negocio, ya que sus ventas han incrementado bastante al igual que sus clientes, y por lo mismo sus ingresos también han aumentado satisfactoriamente, tanto que hasta está ahorrando para asegurar la educación de sus hijos.

La meta que tiene doña Sofía es la de continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios para que puedan terminar una carrera profesional y así tengan un mejor futuro, también quiere hacer crecer mas su pequeño negocio, ya que quiere ampliar un poco mas su negocio, esta pensando en vender también ropa, para tener más variedad de artículos y mas surtido su negocio, para así mejorar e incrementar sus ganancias.

Esta muy agradecida con fundación realidad y los prestatatarios de kiva por el apoyo incondicional que le están brindando, ya que gracias a esta ayuda ha mejorado su calidad de vida y la de su familia, al igual que continuar invirtiendo en su negocio.

Estos son los nombres de las personas y las actividades alas que se dedican cada una de las integrantes del grupo las rosas del puente.
Julieta, Rosa, Judith, Romula, Sofía, Rolanda, Josefa, Carmela, Irene y Marisela quienes se dedican a diferentes actividades como son: abarrotes, venta de cosméticos, tamales, refrescos, ropa y pollos.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Las Rosas del Puente, meaning "The Roses of the Bridge". They decided upon this name because one of the members has a rose greenhouse. The story is about Sofia. She is 43 years old and she is married to Juan Miranda. They have 6 children together, and only Remedios and Juan are in still in school. They are in grade 10 and in grade 3. Sofia sells cosmetics and perfumes by catalogue.

Sofia decided to start out his business because she wanted to find a way to move her children forward and to help her husband with the household expenses and the educational expenses. She also wanted to improve the quality of life for her children. She invested the loan she received in the purchase of more merchandise, such as: catalogues, lipsticks, eye shadows, compacts, nail polish, mascara, eye liners, skin lotions, deodorants, and perfumes in order to add more product variety.

She is very happy because she says that her business has done very well. Her sales have increased significantly and so have her clients. Consequently her income has also increased, so much so that she has been able to save money to ensure her children's education.

Sofia's goal is to keep supporting her children in their studies, enabling them to complete a professional career and to have a better future. She also wants to expand her small business even more. She wants to expand her business and she is thinking of selling clothing, too. She will have a wider variety of articles and her business will have a better selection. it will improve and increase her profits.

She is very thankful to Fundacion Realidad (Kiva Field Partner) and the Kiva lenders for their unconditional support that they have provided. It is thanks to this support that she has been able to improve the quality of her life and that of her family. She will also continue to invest in her business.

These are the names of the individuals and the business activities in which the members of the group, Las Rosas del Puente, are involved in.

Julieta, Rosa, Judith, Romula, Sofia, Rolanda, Josefa, Carmela, Irene, and Marisela. They are involved in a variety of activities, including: grocery store, cosmetics sales, tamales sales, soft drink sales, clothing sales, and poultry sales.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as catalogues, lipsticks, eye shadows, compacts, nail polish, mascara, eye liners, skin lotions, deodorants, and perfumes.

loans.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es:
Miriam de 50 años, una mujer trabajadora que a pesar de ser mujer viuda ha sabido cómo salir adelante.
Ella a los 20 años quedo viuda, un amigo de ella le dio la oportunidad de que aprenda a manejar.

Ahora ella ejerce la profesión de taxista, el horario de ella es de lunes a domingo. Desde las 10:00am y termina la jornada a las 22:00pm. La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia.  Es soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 20, 24, 30 y 34 años, actualmente todos son independientes.

Ella solicita el préstamo para darle mantenimiento a sus vehículos. Su sueño es cada día siga creciendo en su actividad, ya que actualmente tiene una empresa de Renta-car (Taxi amigo).
texts.en:
Miriam is 50 years old and she is a hardworking woman. Despite being widowed she has known how to move forward. She was widowed at the age of 20. A friend of hers gave her the opportunity to learn how to drive. 

Today she is a taxi driver. The schedule that she keeps is from Monday to Sunday. She starts working at 10:00 am and she finishes her day at 10:00 pm. The difficulty she faces is theft. She is single and she has 4 children, aged 20, 24, 30, and 34 years old. They are all independent.

She requests a loan to provide maintenance repairs to her cars. Her dream is to keep her business growing more each day. She currently has a taxi company, named Taxi Amigo.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to her cars.

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es:
Flor es socia el Banco Comunal Los Claveles, tiene 24 años y 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 2 años.
Flor vende papa en el Mercado, desde muy pequeña siempre trabajo vendiendo papa, le ayudaba a sus padres, ahora ella tiene su propio capital y se pudo comprar un carro, le encantaría tener otro carro mas moderno, ella se esta esforzando por ahorrar mas y poder cumplir sus metas. Con este préstamo comprará mas papa.
texts.en:
Flor is a member of the communal bank named Los Claveles. She is 24 years old and she has 2 children. She has been a member of Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 2 years. 

Flor sells potatoes in the market. Ever since she was a young girl she has been selling potatoes. She used to help her parents and today she has her own capital fund. She was able to purchase a car. She would love to have another, newer car. She is making and effort tot save more and to accomplish her goals. She will purchase more potatoes with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes.

loans.name: Justo

texts.es:
El socio Justo pertenece al banco comunal “UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta dias en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento del Cusco.

El socio Justo nació en la provincia de Anta del departamento del cusco, él tiene 53 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 2 hijos, él alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de granos como por ejemplo trigo, habas, entre otros mas, él viaja a las ferias por el Valle Sagrado para vender sus productos a sus clientes, él también tiene un carrito con el que brinda servicio de taxi de las ciudades de Cusco hacia Anta y viceversa, él sale a trabajar de vez en cuando ósea es un trabajo extra que el realiza con su carro. 

El socio Justo solicita el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. 

El socio Justo está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Justo is a member of the communal bank "Union, Fuerza y Amistad", meaning "Unity, Strength and Friendship". The communal bank meetings are held every thirty days in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Justo was born in the province of Anta in the department of Cusco. He is 53 years old and he lives with his common-law wife with whom he has 2 children. He alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling grains such as wheat, lima beans, and others. He travels to the fairs in the Valle Sagrado to sell his products to his clients. He also has a car with which he provides taxi services between the cities of Cusco to Anta and vice versa. He sets out to work every once in a while, that is, this is an extra job that he does with his car.

Justo requests a loan to carry out maintenance repairs to his car.

Justo is happy for his loan and he is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to his car.

loans.name: Donatilda

texts.es:
Donatilda es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 47 años y 4 hijos, es socia desde hace 8 años.
Donatilda tienen un Restaurante, todo ese tiempo ella pudo aprender mucho acerca de cómo administrar su negocio, y también pudo crecer, recuerda que antes vendía anticuchos y salchipapas y así poco a poco pudo progresar, todo lo que aprendía lo hacia en el negocio, con el ahorro pudo lograr que su negocio pueda crecer, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de sillas, su sueño es poder comprar su casa.
texts.en:
Donatilda is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 47 years old and she has 4 children. She has been a member for the past 8 years. 

Donatilda has a restaurant, and all this time she has been able to learn a great deal about administering a business and she managed to expand it. She remembers the time when she used to sell shish-kebabs and salchipapas (a common Peruvian meal consisting of sausages and potatoes) and this is how she gradually progressed. Everything that she learned she practiced in her business. With her saving she managed to expand her business. She will invest her loan in the purchase of chairs. Her dream is to buy a house.

loans.use: to purchase chairs.

loans.name: Hilaria Ursula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hilaria Ursula; ella tiene 51 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía, ella vende bisutería como aretes, collares y pulseras, ella tiene un tienda donde trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería de artesanía como aretes, collares y pulseras al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Hatun Rumiyoc". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Hilaria Ursula. She is 51 years old, a widow, and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her handicrafts business. She sells jewelry such as earrings, necklaces and bracelets. She has a store which she opens for business from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. It is through this business that she has been able to provide for her children. She wants to expand and improve her handicrafts business. She requests a loan to purchase artisan merchandise, such as earrings, necklaces, and bracelets in wholesale.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as earrings, necklaces, and bracelets in wholesale.

loans.name: Ruth Magaly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ruth; La socia tiene 28 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 3 años de edad; La socia es ejecutiva de Esika es una revista de venta de productos de belleza por catalogo, la socia ahora desea invertir el crédito en la compra de cerveza como un deposito y vender al por mayor. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cerveza para vender al por mayor.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Imasumac II". It is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Ruth. She is 28 years old, married, and she has a 3-year old son. She is an executive of Esika, a magazine catalogue of beauty products. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of beer to start out a depot and sell in wholesale. She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of beer to sell in wholesale.

She is thankful for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments according to the agreed schedule.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of beer in order to sell in wholesale.

loans.name: Zenovia

texts.es:
Zenovia es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 32 años y 2 hijos.
Zenovia vende abarrotes, recuerda que empezó con 300 soles y con ese primer préstamo compró las cosas que le faltaban para su tienda, y con todo lo que pudo esforzarse pudo construir su casa, ahora con este préstamo comprará atún, azúcar y jabón que es lo que le falta. Da gracias a Finca por toda la ayuda que le brindaron, le enseñaron a ser responsable, le daba las ganas para poder seguir trabajando, el ahorro siempre le ayudo a poder cumplir sus metas, pudo educar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Zenovia is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 32 years old and she has 2 children. Zenovia sells groceries. She recalls that she started out with 300 soles and with this first loan she purchased the items that her store required. And with it all she managed to have a house built for her. With this loan she will purchase tuna, sugar, and soap, which is the merchandise that she lacks. She is thankful to Finca (Kiva Field Partner) for all of the help they have given her. They taught her to be responsible and she gained the strength to keep working. The savings have always helped her attain her goals and she has been able to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to purchase tuna, sugar, and soap.

loans.name: Nouha

texts.fr:
Nouha est de la région sud du sénégal age de 40 ans,il pratique ce metier pendant 15 ans.
IL achète ses outils de travail dans la meme région.Pendant la période de la chaleure,il est charger dans son atelier pour les bobinage de ventilateur chambre,de réfrigérateur,de groupoe électrogène.
Nouha marié depuis juin 2010,avec son metier,il assure la restauration de sa famille et la location de sa chambre.
texts.en:
Nouha, age 40, is from Southern Senegal. He's been repairing electronic devices for 15 years. He gets his work tools from the same region.

In his workshop, during the hot season, he's in charge of windings for fans, refrigerators, and diesel generators. 

Nouha has been married since June 2010 and, with his job, he pays his family food expenses and rent.

loans.use: to buy work tools and counters from Senelec

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 64 años y 8 hijos, es casada, es socia D. FINCA Peru desD. hace 15 años.
Aljandrina tiene un Estudio Fotográfico, que es uno D. los estudios mas antiguos D. Ayacucho y es muy recurrido por todo Ayacucho, siempre estuvo en Finca y siempre tuvo su negocio, recuerda que con el primer préstamo pudo comprar una filmadora, y así poco a poco pudo seguir adelante gracias a todas las capacitaciones que ha recibido en temas como el sobreendeudamiento.
Alejandrina esta muy agradecida por el ahorro, por ello pudo cumplir sus metas, como hacer su casa, ahora su meta es poder comprarse una computadora e impresora para las impresión D. las fotos, ahora el préstamo comprara mas papel fotográfico.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 64 years old and she has 8 children. She is married and she has been a member of Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 15 years.

Alejandrina has a photography studio. It is one of the longest established studios in Ayacucho and it is highly visited by all of Ayacucho. She has always been with Finca and she has always had her business. She recalls that with her first loan she managed to buy a camera and this is how she gradually started to move forward. It is thanks to all of orientation that she has received on topics such as indebtedness.


Alejandrina is very thankful for the savings and it is through them that she has attained her goals, including having a house built for her. Her new goal is to buy a computer and a printer to print photos. The loan will be used to buy photographic paper.

loans.use: to purchase photographic paper

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan Jose; el tiene 31 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de multiservicios donde se realizan fotocopias, anillados y otros servicios, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de multiservicios. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el comprar materiales  como papel y repuestos para la fotocopiadora.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Hatun Rumiyoc". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

His name is Juan Jose. He is 31 years old and he is single. He alternates his daily activities with his print store where he makes photocopies, binds books and other services. He works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. He wants to expand his print store. He requests a loan to purchase materials such as paper and parts for the photocopier.

He is happy for this loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase products such as paper and parts for the photocopier.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Haydee; La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 17, 15, 13, 5 años de edad; La socia se dedica  a la elaboración de diferentes potajes y a la venta de los mismos, la socia tiene un stand en el cual ella ofrece sus diversos platos, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el crédito en la compra de insumos para continuar con sus negocio y de esta manera mejorar sus ventas, la socia desea invertir en la compra de insumos como arroz al por mayor, aceite, para las frituras y otros productos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para elaborar sus potajes.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank ”IMASUMAC II” which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Sra. Haydee. She is 38 years old, married and has 4 children aged 17, 15, 13 and 5 years. The member makes and sells different kinds of stew. The member has a stall at which she sells her various dishes. On this occasion, the member wants to use the loan to purchase supplies to continue with her business and in this way improve her sales. The member wants to invest in the purchase of supplies such as: wholesale rice, oil for frying and other products. The member is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of supplies to make her stews.

The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to make the repayments in accordance with the schedule of payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies with which to make her stews.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase traditional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia Esther pertenece al banco comunal” UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD” y las reuniones D. las socias son cada treinta días en la ciudad del Cusco. Cusco perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia Esther nació en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 52 años D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene 2 hijos, ella tiene su negocio D. venta D. ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ella también venD. polos, chompas, pantalones, camisas entre otros más, ella venD. por las mañanas en la feria dominical del distrito D. San Sebastián y esta es la única actividad que realiza por el momento ya que los demás días se dedica a su casa. La socia Esther también se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza D. las marcas D. Esika y Avon. En esta oportunidad Esther requiere el préstamo para comprar más ropa. 

La socia Esther está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Esther belongs to the communal bank “Union, Fuerza Y Amistad” (Union, Strength, and Friendship). The members meet every 30 days in the city of Cusco. Cusco belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member Esther was born in the city of Cusco. She is 52 years old, married and has 2 children from the marriage. She has a business selling clothes for women, men and children. She also sells polo shirts, sweaters, trousers, shirts and many other items. She sells in the mornings at the Sunday fairs in the district of San Sebastian. This is her only business activity at the moment as she dedicates the rest of the week to household chores. The member Esther also sells beauty products by Esika and Avon. On this occasion, Esther needs the loan to buy more clothes.

The member Esther is happy for the loan and agrees to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, tiene la edad 45 de años, está soltero y vive con sus padres actualmente que son su prioridad. El con el dinero va comprar vacas para la producción de leche. El tiene un potrero para el mantenimiento en buenas condiciones de estos animales y así obtener de esta los mejores resultados. El tiene como meta con el ingreso de leche para el hogar liberar algunos gastos y así tener dinero para comprar otras cosas necesarias del hogar. También pretende con la leche que no se consuma en el hogar venderla y así también colaborar con más ingresos para el bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jorge is 45 years old and single. He lives with his parents and they are his priority. With the money, he will buy cows for milk production. He has a well maintained field for these animals and therefore he will get good results. With the income earned from the milk, his goal is to get rid of some expenses and to have money to purchases other things for the home. He also plans on not consuming the milk but to sell it and therefore he will have more income for his family’s well-being. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any loan with other state banks. FUDECOSUR offered the best terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: purchase dairy cows.

loans.name: Efren Humberto

texts.es:
A sus 42 años de edad Efrén es un hombre emprendedor, un esposo responsable y un padre que se siente orgulloso de sus 4 hijos, desde  hace varios años tiene un negocio familiar que les ha ayudado a cumplir con las necesidades básicas de su hogar, y entre sus hijos su esposa y él se encargan de sacar adelante su microempresa donde venden arepas de queso en un sector muy comercial de Bello, un municipio del departamento de Antioquia.

Actualmente sueñan con ver progresar el negocio, y comenzar a distribuir las arepas a otras microempresas que se encarguen de su venta, pero esto requiere producir en mayor cantidad, pero hoy en día no cuentan con el capital necesario para comprar la materia prima al por mayor para que la producción y comercialización de las arepas sea mas efectiva, Efrén solicita un préstamo para hacer dichas compras, mejorar y aumentar las ventas para lograr tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: At 42 years of age, Efrén is an entrepreneurial man, a responsible husband and a father who feels proud of his four children. For several years, Efrén has had a family business which has helped him to cover his household's basic needs. Between his children, his wife and himself, they work to get ahead in their micro-business selling cheese 'arepas' in a very commercial area of Bello, a town in Antioquia department. They are currently dreaming of making progress in their business and starting to distribute their 'arepas' to other micro-businesses to sell. However, this requires them to produce in larger quantities. Right now, they don't have the capital they need to buy their supplies wholesale which would make their production and sales of 'arepas' more effective. Efrén is requesting a loan to make these purchases, and to improve and increase their sales so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food

loans.name: Celedonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Celedonio; el tiene 44 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio por medio de este trabajo saca adelantes a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de taxi.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mantenimiento de su carro para comprar llantas. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Celedonio is a member of the "Hatun Rumiyoc" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Celedonio is 44 years old, lives with his partner, and has three children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his taxi service.  He works from 5.00am to 6.00pm.  He has a car which he uses to provide a taxi service.  Through this work, he supports his children.  Celedonio would like to expand and improve his taxi business.  He is requesting this loan to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy tires.

Celedonio is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy tires

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando tiene 65 años, es un hombre amable y muy talentoso, convive con su pareja, él aún no tiene hijos pero su pareja sí, que ya son mayores e independiente. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. El trabajo al que se dedica es la ebanistería, es un artista diseñanado muebles, pues trabaja con la madera, le da forma y arma sus lindos productos, su especialidad son las sillas, mesas, sofa, entre otros. Tiene un taller que monto en su casa, ahí es donde trabaja todos los días para cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Tiene 16 años realizando esta actividad, pero hay momentos que tiene mucho pedidos que necesita contratar personas para que lo ayuden.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo, es independiente y no tiene que rendir cuentas a nadie, por ello disfruta su trabajo, y gracias a ello logró educar a sus hijos políticos, como hijos si fueran sus hijos. Este será el créstamo número once con MFP le esta yendo bien y esta muy contenta de trabajar con su grupo ya que son muy responsables, esta muy agradecida pues los prestamos recibidos anteriormente le fueron de mucha ayuda y fueron muy bien invertido, espera contar nuevamente con su ayuda. Con el monto solicitado, comprará madera para que pueda tener ya fabricados su muebles.
texts.en:
Orlando is 65 years old.  He is a kind and very talented man who lives with his partner.  He doesn't have children himself but his partner does.  They are grown up and live independently.  Orlando and his partner live together in their own home.

Orlando is a carpenter.  He is an artist who designs furniture.  He works with wood and forms and assembles his beautiful products.  His specialities are chairs, tables, sofas, etc.  He has a workshop which he set up in his home.  This is where he works every day in order to fill the orders from his customers.  He has been in this business for 16 years and there are times when he has a lot of orders and needs to hire people to help him.

What Orlando enjoys about his work is the fact that he chooses how to spend his time, he is independent and he doesn't have to account to anybody.  For this reason, he enjoys his work and it has enabled him to educate his stepchildren as if they were his own children.  This will be his eleventh loan from MFP.  His business is doing well and he is very happy to be working with his group as they are all very responsible people.  He is very grateful as the previous loans that he received were very helpful and very well invested.  He hopes to be able to count on your help once again.  He will use the sum he has requested to buy wood so that he can make his furniture.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Arthur

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HATUN RUMIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Arthur; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como docente del nivel secundario y también es socio de una academia de preparación pre universitaria, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medios de su trabajo y de su negocio el socio quiere salir adelante, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de academia. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar carpetas e implementar la academia pre universitaria.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Arthur is a member of the 'Hatun Rumiyoc' community bank which is located in Cusco district, province and department.

Arthur is 28 years old and single.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his work as a high school teacher.  He is also a member of an academy which prepares students for university.  He works from 7.00am to 8.00pm and, through his work and his business, he would like to get ahead in life.  He would like to expand and improve the pre-university prep school business.  He is requesting this loan to buy folders and equip the academy.

Arthur is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy folders and equip the pre-university prep school

loans.name: Janny

texts.es: Janny, de 27 años es una mujer luchadora. Ella convive con Omar, su esposo desde hace 7 años. Ambos tienen una hija: Andrea, a la que quieren mucho y cuidan en casa de su madre, ubicada en el barrio de Chupaca. Su rostro apacible y tranquilo, muestra la serenidad que la caracteriza. A sus cortos 20 años enfrentó muchas responsabilidades. Uno de ellos es la llegada de su pequeña hija, a la que quiere mucho. Ella continuó estudiando a pesar de ello y ahora trabaja como asistente administrativa en el gobierno local de su comunidad, donde gracias a su trabajo recibe un sueldo mensual de parte del estado. Pero como ella desea mejorar su calidad de vida. Hace poco abrió una tienda de comestibles en casa de su mamá, que le ayuda a atender a sus clientes durante la mañana, ya en la tarde y culminando su trabajo ella asume la atención de su negocio. Además cría vacas y becerros que enseba para luego comercializarlos a un mayor precio. Con todos estos ingresos, espera juntar el dinero necesario para brindar a su hija una buena educación. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde agradece la confianza que depositan en ella, motivo que la estimula a seguir progresando. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Janny de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestibles, pues comenta que si compra en cantidad; tiene mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
27-year-old Janny is a tenacious woman.  She lives with Omar, her husband of seven years.  The couple have one daughter, Andrea, who they love very much and care for in her mother's house which is located in Chupaca neighborhood.  Janny's calm and gentle face reflects the serenity for which she is noted.

At just 20 years of age, Janny faced many responsibilities.  One of these responsibilities came with the arrival of her young daughter who she loves very much.  She continued studying in spite of this and now works as an administrative assistant with the local government in her community.  Thanks to her work, she receives a monthly salary from the State.  However, as she would like to improve her quality of life, she recently opened a grocery store in her mom's home.  Her mom helps her to serve her customers in the mornings and afternoons and, when she finishes work, Janny takes over.  In addition, she also raises cows and calves which she fattens and then sells at a higher price.  With all these sources of income, she hopes to be able to put together the money she needs to provide her daughter with a good education.

This is Janny's second loan from MFP and she is grateful for the trust that has been placed in her.  This drives her to continue making progress and she pledges to make her loan repayments on time.  With your support, Janny will invest the money she has requested in buying basic household products for her grocery store because she says that if she buys in bulk she makes more profits.

loans.use: to buy basic household products to stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase beans and other ingredients necessary to make refried beans.

loans.name: Mnatsakan

texts.ru: Мнацакан нужны средства на постройку дополнительной теплицы. Для этого надо купить железную арматуру и пленку - материалы для постройки теплицы. Прошлый кредит Мнацакан использовал на постройку теплицы. Каждый год расширяется. Получил прибыль - в этом году Мнацакан смог наторговать 90 тыс грн (валовый доход) несмотря на то, что цены в этом сезоне были очень низкими. Младшая дочь поступила учиться в колледж; старший сын уже работает, живет самостоятельно.
texts.en: Mnatsakan needs funds to build an additional greenhouse.  He needs to buy metal fixtures and plastic, which are the necessary materials for building a greenhouse.  Mnatsakan used his previous loan to build a greenhouse.  He expands every year.  He made a profit - this year, Mnatsakan was able to earn a gross income of 90 thousand hryvnia from sales, despite the fact that prices were very low during this season.  His younger daughter was accepted to attend a college, and the oldest son already works and lives independently.

loans.use: to build an additional greenhouse

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es: Georgina, D. 52 años es una mujer luchadora que junto a William, su esposo desD. hace 28 años. Cuidan a 3 D. sus 5 hijos; en su casa propia ubicada en la ciudad D. Huancayo. Ella es una mujer luchadora, su principal virtud es el ingenio que tiene en cualquier negocio que emprenD.. La venta D. productos D. belleza en todo tipo D. marcas, es su principal actividad económica. Además brinda el servició D. lavado D. ropas y limpieza D. casas, donD. le va muy bien, pues durante este tiempo logró obtener buenos clientes. Pero como ella gusta D. estar ocupada y activa; en festividades del mes D. octubre, venD. turrones en las calles acompañando a la procesión del cristo moreno. Además D. panteones en navidad y la preparación D. comida los días domingo en una esquina D. su casa. Las ganas D. progreso D. está mujer son impresionantes, “tengo que trabajar para sacar a mis hijos adelante”, afirma, ya que uno D. ellos estudia una carrera universitaria y su mayor deseo es ver a todos sus hijos como unos profesionales, responsables y con éxito. Este es el décimo crédito con MFP, se siente aliviada, pues tiene el apoyo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago D. sus cuotas. La casa D. Georgina necesita D. algunos arreglos, por ello D. recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra D. puertas, ventanas y pago al personal para revestir sus paredes con un material fuerte.
texts.en: Georgina, 52, is a hard-working woman who alongsiD. William, her husband for 28 years, cares for three of her five children in their own house located in the city of Huancayo. She is a hard-working woman. Her principle virtue is the knack that she has with whatever business she starts. Selling beauty products from all types of brands is her main economic activity. Additionally, she provides a laundry and a house cleaning service which do well and during this time she has managed to obtain good customers. But she likes to be busy and active. In the festivities of the month of October, she sells candies in the street accompanying the procession of the black Christ, in addition to cemetaries at Christmas and preparing food on Sundays in a corner of her home. This woman's desire to get ahead are impressive, "i have to work to get my children ahead" she affirms since one of them studies at university and her greatest wish is to see all of her children become professionals, responsible and with success. This is her tenth loan with MFP. She feels relieved since she has the support she needs to achieve her objectives. Additionally, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. Georgina's house needs some repairs for which she needs your support. She will invest the money requested in the purchase of doors, windows and to pay the people to recoat her walls with a strong material.

loans.use: to purchase doors and windows for her house, as well as pay the construction workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his tuition and professional seminars.

loans.name: Silveria

texts.es:
La señora Silveria cuenta con la edad de 72 años, es viuda desde hacen 10 años, tiene 6 hijos, de los cuales ya todos están casados, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, desde hace 3 años.
